airportwest.description:
CONCIERGE DESK

You'll find the Westfield Airport West Concierge Desk located on Level 1 (near Best & Less). We’re available to assist with directions, retailer information, lost property, transport information and more.

At Westfield Airport West we offer hire service of both wheelchairs and power-shoppers to make your shopping trip more comfortable. Bookings are essential and can be made by calling or by visiting the Concierge Desk.

You also have the option of hiring our strollers and kiddie Kabs, which make your shopping experience, as well as your kids', so much more enjoyable! There is a small cost for kiddie kabs and strollers are free to hire. We also have free balloons! For more information visit the Concierge Desk.

WESTFIELD GIFT CARDS

Westfield Gift Cards are accepted at over 8,000 participating retailers in Australian Westfield Centres. It’s the gift they’ve always wanted and suitable for any occasion.

Gift Cards can be purchased from Centre Concierge Desks or online.

Buy Now or Redeem at these stores

Westfield Airport West offers all day FREE parking to shoppers with over 2,700 car parking spaces.

You'll also find plenty of disabled parking and parents with pram parking in convenient locations.

For your convenience, we have also introduced 90 minute parking for those customers who wish to visit the centre for only a short period of time.

The main car park entrances are located off Westfield Drive and Louis Street.

Customers can use up to 1GB or 3HRS of free data every day (whichever comes first).

To access FREE Wi-Fi at Westfield Airport West follow these steps:

1. Ensure your wireless enabled laptop or Smart Phone is turned on and has its wireless signal activated.

2. Go to Available Wireless Network Collection List

3. Select "_WestfieldFreeWiFi" from the list. You may need to select 'Connect'

4. On the welcome screen enter your details and accept the Terms and Conditions to access Free WiFi. The Terms and Conditions must be accepted before you can use the Free WiFi service.

5. Once the Terms and Conditions are accepted, you will be taken to the Free WiFi launch page and you can use your free WiFi.

Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy for the Free WiFi Service are available on the login page, or alternatively can be reviewed here
airportwest.long_title: Enjoy FREE Wi Fi while you shop!

bondijunction.description: For all customer queries and feedback, please phone or email Concierge.

CONCIERGE DESK

You'll find our Concierge Desks located on Level 3 outside Myer, Level 3 near the Grosvenor Street entry and on Level P4, near our Valet Lounge.

The Concierge team are extremely helpful and available to assist with directions, store information, lost property, transport information and more.

Ticketless parking is now in operation at Westfield Bondi Junction. By allowing you to park without the need for a paper ticket, parking will be quicker and easier than ever before. Parking rates below.

HOW IT WORKS

1. There is no boom gate at entry, so you can drive straight into the car park. There will be a digital clock displaying your time of entry - remember the time you entered as you will not be issued with a paper ticket.

2a. Upon leaving the shopping centre, if your visit to the car park is within the 2 hours free parking period provided, proceed straight to the exit. The parking system will recognise your licence plate number and the boom gate will automatically open.

2b. If your visit to the car park is over the 2 hours free parking period provided, head to one of the many pay stations, enter your licence plate number and pay the parking fee. Drive to the exit where the system will recognise your parking payment and the boom gate will open automatically. If you exit the centre, there must be 30 minutes between exit and re-entry in order to receive another ‘2 hours free parking’ period.

2c. Alternatively, you can register at parkwestfield.com.au to have your parking fee automatically deducted from your credit card.

BENEFITS OF REGISTERING

Save time, drive in and out without visiting the pay station. Simply register with your credit card and when you exit the car park after your stay, your parking fee will be automatically deducted from your card. Register at parkwestfield.com.au.

HOW DO I KNOW HOW MUCH TIME I HAVE LEFT?

Check your entry time on the digital clock at each car park entry upon arrival.

During your visit you can check your elapsed parking time by typing your licence plate into one of the many pay stations and digital directories in the centre.

Full conditions of entry are displayed throughout the car park. FAQs TERMS & CONDITIONS

PARKING RATES

Westfield Bondi Junction offers up to 2 hours free parking. We operate a ticketless parking system with licence plate recognition, which means that there is no need for you to take a ticket on entry.

Time Weekday Weekend
0 -2.0hrs FREE FREE
2.0 – 2.5hrs $8.00 $8.00

You are entitled to 2 hours free parking on your first entry into the car park. When returning to the car park in the same day you will only receive an additional 2 hours free parking if your time of car park re-entry is more than 30 minutes after your previous car park exit.

CINEMA PARKING

Keep your movie ticket with you in order to receive an additional 1 hour free parking. Validate your parking at any pay station before returning to your car using the barcode on your movie ticket. When you enter the car park after 6pm you will receive free parking. Parking fees apply beyond 3 hours from the time of entry.

FREE PARKING WITH ENTRY AFTER 6PM

Enter after 6pm and exit before 1am. Excludes public holidays, Events and the month of December

DISABILITY PERMIT

Register for an additional 2 hour validation at any Concierge Desk upon presentation of your valid permit. If you register for Ticketless Parking, you can apply your Disability Parking Permit to your registration and you only have to visit Concierge once.

MAIN CAR PARK ENTRANCES

Grafton Street and Hollywood Avenue.

TERMS & CONDITIONS

Full conditions of entry are displayed throughout the car park and are available to view on the link below. View them here

Allow more time for shopping with our Valet Parking service.

At only $15*, Valet Parking is the ultimate shopping indulgence at an affordable price.

There are 3 easy steps to follow:

  1. Enter car park via P4 (entry via Grafton Street, David Jones).
  2. Issue your keys to our Valet Attendant and they will give you a retrieval passport.
  3. Return to the Valet Parking Lounge once you have finished shopping and they will retrieve your car for you.

Additional Valet Services: Ask our Valet staff about our HandsFree Shopping Service.

*Valet parking is $15 per visit. Standard parking fees still apply after 2hrs.

Our Handsfree Shopping service takes the strain away whilst you continue shopping, dining or catching up with friends. You don’t have to carry your shopping with you - we’ll take care of it for you.

To use this exclusive service:

  1. Register when you arrive at Valet and receive your Handsfree Shopping pass.
  2. When you make a purchase, quote your Valet pass to the retailer to log your shopping with our Handsfree Shopping Service.
  3. Whilst you continue to shop, our customer service team will collect your shopping and deliver it to your car in Valet.

    4. Regular parking charges apply.

    The Valet Lounge is located on Level P4.

The Westfield Suite, conveniently located inside Westfield Bondi Junction, is a unique and elegant multi-purpose function space available for hire. The Westfield Suite is a flexible event space with different layout options and catering available.

The space includes a main lounge area, outdoor terrace, boardroom area, spacious bathroom and a kitchen allowing the flexibility to host of range of functions including;

  • Lifestyle events
  • Product launches
  • Styling sessions
  • Client conferences
  • Staff Workshops
  • Business Conferences

Thanks to Westfield and Optus, you can use up to 180 minutes or 1GB of free data every day. To access free WiFi at Westfield Bondi Junction follow these steps:

1. Ensure your wireless enabled laptop or Smart Phone is turned on and has its wireless signal activated.

2. Go to Available Wireless Network Collection List

3. Select "_WestfieldFreeWiFi" from the list. You may need to select 'Connect'

4. On the welcome screen enter your details and select “Connect to WiFi”. By Connecting to the WiFi you agree to the Terms and Conditions and Westfield Privacy Policy.

5. Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy for the Free WiFi Service are available on the login page, or alternatively can be reviewed here

WESTFIELD GIFT CARDS

Westfield Gift Cards are accepted at over 8,000 participating retailers in Australian Westfield Centres. It’s the gift they’ve always wanted and suitable for any occasion.

Gift Cards can be purchased from Centre Concierge Desks or online.

Buy Now or Redeem at these stores
Valet customers can enjoy complimentary use of the ChargePoint stations located on P4 to electronically charge their compatible vehicles.

The children's Playworld, is open on Level 3 outside Woolworths. 

All children are welcome and entry is free however children must be supervised at all times.

We’d love to keep in touch!

Subscribe to your local Westfield newsletter to hear about:

  • Special offers, deals and sale alerts
  • Shoppable edits of the best fashion, gifts, homewares and more
  • Events and activities for all ages
  • The latest fashion and beauty trends, delicious meal ideas, and style guides from our Westfield editors
  • New release movies and entertainment
  • Store and service announcements, and upgrades to your local centre

Fashion Styling

Needing to update your wardrobe or looking for something for a special event. Our stylists will provide you with access to some of the world's leading luxury brands and Australian designers at WBJ. 

Book in with one of our experienced Stylists and enjoy a tailored shopping experience that will help you find exactly what you're looking for.

Our stylist will greet you in valet whilst 

. , our Stylists can connect you with the very latest fashion trends, must-have accessories or even just draw out and enhance your own natural individuality.

Taking advantage of the luxurious Westfield Suite - it is the perfect reward and most sublime indulgence.

Receive 2 hours free parking when you shop at Westfield Burwood and 1 hour free parking if you watch a movie. Standard car park rates apply thereafter.

Parking

The Easy way to pay for parking! You've finished your shopping and you want to get home and put your feet up. Now you can get home even sooner. Westfield Burwood's Auto Pay means no more waiting in a long queue at the boomgate.

How it works:

1. Enter as normal and take your parking ticket with you.

2. If under 2 hours, return to your car and proceed to exit OR If over 2 hours, pay at any Auto Pay Station before returning to your car.

3. Exit the car park by inserting your ticket into the exit station.

All exit booths will be automatic and unmanned. Westfield's easy to use Auto Pay Stations take cash as well as VISA and MasterCard.

And remember, if you've parked for less than 2 hours, all you have to do is return to your car.

Disabled parkers please note you are eligible to receive 4 hours complimentary parking. However you will need to present your permit along with your parking ticket at the Concierge Desk for Validation.

2 hours free once per day only. Conditions of entry as displayed throughout the car park.

Free parking with entry after 7pm (excludes public holidays, December and special events).

Parking Information for Cinema Patrons

Cinema patrons receive an additional 1 hour free parking to the standard 2 hours free parking upon validation of parking ticket at Event Cinemas.

Up to 3 hours: Free parking with validation at Event Cinemas

Over 3 hours: Standard parking rates apply

Parking tickets must be validated at Event Cinemas.

Our friendly Concierge staff at Westfield Burwood are at your service.

Westfield Burwood Concierge can assist you with store locations, lost children, lost property, transport information and other general queries you may have.

You'll find the Concierge Desk located on Ground level (near David Jones).

We're also available to assist with Westfield Gift Card sales!

Customer service is extremely important to us and we want to make your visit as enjoyable and comfortable as possible. You'll find our Concierge Desks located on Level 1 near David Jones and Ground level near Kathmandu.

You can hire Prams, Kiddy Cars, Powershoppers and Wheelchairs from Concierge on Level 1 only.

Our Concierge Team are available to assist with directions, lost property, transport information, Westfield Gift Card sales, retailer information and more.

CONTACT US:

If you have a question or some feedback to pass on to us please get in touch by emailing CCarindale3@scentregroup.com

FREE CUSTOMER PARKING WITH ENTRY AFTER 6PM  Free parking is available for customers entering after 6pm and exiting before 6am. 

HOW IT WORKS 

  1. There is a boom gate at the entry, so you will need to press the button for a ticket to be produced. After obtaining your ticket drive straight into the car park. Our Parking Guidance system will direct you to available bays.Please ensure you keep your parking ticket safe on your person.
  2. When you are ready to leave, take your parking ticket to one of the blue pay stations located near any Centre entry/exit pedestrian door. Insert the ticket in to the pay station to check it.a) if your visit is less than 3 hours, your ticket will be returned to you with a 15 minute grace period for exiting.b) if your visit is over 3 hours, a small payment may be required. Pay the amount displayed on screen, if you need a receipt ensure that you press the receipt button. Once payment has been made, the ticket will be returned to you with a 15 minute grace period for exiting.


REQUIRE ASSISTANCE?

All of our car park equipment have help buttons on them. If you require assistance, press the Help Button and our friendly Car Park Team will assist you. DISABILITY PERMIT  Register for a Free Parking validation at any Concierge Desk upon presentation of your valid permit. 


SPEND $200 RECEIVE COMPLIMENTARY PARKING PROMOTIONⁱ

If you spend over $200 in a single visit, you can have your ticket validated for up to 8 hours free parking. Present your valid spend receipts with your parking ticket to a Concierge Desk during trade hours to receive this offer.

ⁱ Terms and Conditions apply, available at the Concierge Desks. MAIN CARPARK ENTRANCES  Creek Road

The southern ramp just after the Winstanley St/Creek Rd intersection provides access the rooftop areas including , Blue, Green and Orange Car Parks.

The intersection along Creek Rd offers vehicles travelling from the north access to the ground level area from which all car park areas can be accessed.

For vehicles traveling from the north the Red Car Park Ramp from Creek Rd provides immediate access to Level Mezzanine of the Red Car Park.

 

Millennium Blvd

The Yellow/Red B2 Car Park entry driveway is the eastern most entry point on Millennium Blvd providing immediate access to our Premium Valet Service and general parking areas.

The Yellow/Red B1 Car Park entry driveway is off the roundabout at Millennium Blvd and Bedivere St, offering access to the Red and Yellow car parks.

 

Carindale St

The Yellow B1 entry driveway is located along Carindale St at the northern end of the bus interchange.

The White Car Park entry driveway is located along Carindale St at the southern end of the bus interchange and provides access to both ground and rooftop car parks.

 

Winstanley St

The main entry and exit point for our Purple Car Park is located off the roundabout at Winstanley St and Aldford St.

The Hungry Jacks/Sizzler entry point provides access for vehicles traveling east along Winstanley St.

Allow more time for shopping with our Premium Valet Parking service. 

At only $10ⁱⁱ, Valet Parking is the ultimate shopping indulgence at an affordable price. 

There are 3 easy steps to follow: 

  1. Enter car park via Millennium Blvd. Level B2 entry.
  2. Hand your keys to one of our friendly Valet Attendants and they will give you a retrieval passport.
  3. Return to the Valet Parking Lounge once you have finished shopping and they will retrieve your car for you. 

Operating Hours

Monday 9:00am – 5:30pm

Tuesday 9:00am – 5:30pm

Wednesday 9:00am – 5:30pm

Thursday 9:00am – 9:00pm

Friday 9:00am – 5:30pm

Saturday 9:00am – 5:00pm

Sunday 10:00am – 5:00pm

ⁱⁱ Valet parking is $10 per visit. Standard parking fees apply after 3hrs.

ABOUT PERSONAL STYLING

If you're in need of a new look, have a special event coming up or are simply looking to overhaul your wardrobe and need a little help, our Personal Styling Sessions are for you! Book in with one of our experienced Stylists and enjoy a tailored shopping experience that will help you find exactly what you're looking for.

Your session will start off with your choice of tea or coffee whilst you get to know your chosen Stylist. From here you’ll hit the shops armed with the knowledge of your Stylist who knows our centres, the stores and what’s the right fit for you.

Whether you’re time-poor, unsure of where to shop or what to look for, are searching for the perfect outfit for an upcoming event or simply treating a special someone, our Personal Style Sessions are just for you.

COST

2 hour Styling Session $200

3 Hour Styling Session $300

WHAT’S INCLUDED

Tea or coffee on arrival

Complimentary Valet parking

BOOK YOUR SESSION

Please call Concierge to book with your preferred Stylist today.

Westfield Carindale offer a FREE Justice of the Peace Service.

This service is available:

Monday, Wednesday and Friday 10:00AM -2:00PM Thursday evening 6:00PM – 7:30PM Saturday 10:00AM – 12:00PM

You can find our JP in the Carindale Library, located near the Glasshouse. Please note due to unforeseen circumstances JP's may not be available.

Phone battery about to die?

Thanks to Virgin Mobile, you can now recharge your mobile phone using free phone charge lockers, now available at Westfield Carindale, located in the Food Courts. 

Simply stash your phone in a charge locker, choose your pin, then keep shopping while your phone gets an energy boost!

Visit virginmobile.com.au or find us in-store, click here for store information

carousel.description:
Time for a new look? Whether it's for that special occasion or you want to introduce the wow factor into your wardrobe, book a Personal Style Session with a Westfield Stylist.

After giving your stylist the lowdown on what you're looking for they'll go through your personalised style - which pinpoints everything from your body shape to the perfect make-up shades for you - and give you some top tips and advice. The best bit? They'll take you to the stores that can make it happen.

SENIOR STYLIST - ADY ORUPE

Ady has worked as a fashion make-up artist and hair stylist for 15 years, and started styling 10 years ago after demands from clients. Her knowledge, skills and passion in making women look and feel amazing has given her an excellent reputation on the Perth fashion scene.

As a mother of four, Ady understands a woman's hectic lifestyle, battles with body shape and how to dress to enhance what you love and hide what you don’t. Ady will keep you on trend and on budget, whatever your lifestyle!

Hourly Rate: $90 per hour (min. 2 hour booking. 1 hour bookings available, subject to stylist availability.)

RESIDENT STYLIST - LISA FOWLER

Lisa has worked in the fashion industry for more than 20 years and has an amazing creative eye and passion for styling, along with a talent for putting together key looks incorporating the latest styles, colours, materials and patterns. Through completing a Certificate in Styling she gained a great understanding of what styles work best for all body shapes and sizes. Being a working Mum, Lisa understands the needs of her client’s lifestyle and loves working with each individual to tailor a fabulous look to suit.

Hourly Rate: $65 per hour (min. 2 hour booking. 1 hour bookings available, subject to stylist availability.)

HOW TO BOOK

Book your session today by visiting the Concierge Desk or emailing us at carouselmarketing@scentregroup.com with your name, preferred date, session time and which fabulous stylist you would like to see.

Our permanent children's playworld is located on level 1 behind Concierge and next to Caffissimo.

All children are welcome and entry is free however children must be supervised at all times.

Phone battery about to die? Thanks to Virgin Mobile, you can now recharge your mobile phone using free phone charge lockers, now available at Westfield Carousel in the Food Court on Level 1. Simply stash your phone in a charge locker, choose your pin, then keep shopping while your phone gets an energy boost!

Visit virginmobile.com.au or find us in-store, click here for store information

Our permanent children's playworld is located behind Concierge near Caffissimo.

All children are welcome and entry is free, however children must be supervised at all times.

Ticketless parking is now in operation at Westfield Doncaster. By allowing you to park without the need for a paper ticket, parking will be quicker and easier than ever before. See parking rates below.

*FREE PARKING PROMOTION

For a limited time only, you are eligible to receive an extra free hour’s parking each time you visit Westfield Doncaster. See parkwestfield.com.au for details. 

HOW IT WORKS

1. There is no boom gate at entry, so you can drive straight into the car park. There will be a digital clock displaying your time of entry - remember the time you entered as you will not be issued with a paper ticket.

2a. Upon leaving the shopping centre, if your visit to the car park is within the 3 hours free parking period provided, proceed straight to the exit. The parking system will recognise your licence plate number and the boom gate will automatically open.

2b. If your visit to the car park is over the 3 hours free parking period provided, head to one of the many pay stations, enter your licence plate number and pay the parking fee. Drive to the exit where the system will recognise your parking payment and the boom gate will open automatically. If you exit the centre, there must be 2 hours between exit and re-entry in order to receive another ‘3 hours free parking’ period.

2c. Alternatively, you can register at parkwestfield.com.au to have your parking fee automatically deducted from your credit card.

BENEFITS OF REGISTERING

Save time, drive in and out without visiting the pay station. Simply register with your credit card and when you exit the car park after your stay, your parking fee will be automatically deducted from your card. Register at parkwestfield.com.au.

HOW DO I KNOW HOW MUCH TIME I HAVE LEFT?

Check your entry time on the digital clock at each car park entry upon arrival.

During your visit you can check your elapsed parking time by typing your licence plate into one of the many pay stations and digital directories in the centre.

Full conditions of entry are displayed throughout the car park. FAQs      TERMS & CONDITIONS

PARKING RATES

Westfield Doncaster offers up to 3 hours free parking. We operate a ticketless parking system with licence plate recognition, which means that there is no need for you to take a ticket on entry.

Let our team of professional stylists inspire you and help you put together the perfect wardrobe.

You might have a special event coming up, be heading back into the workforce after having a baby or it might just be time for a refresh. Whatever the occasion, our stylists can help you put together the perfect wardrobe. Our styling sessions also make the perfect gift for someone special.

Every booking receives a $20 Beaute 2001 Gift Card.

The Westfield Doncaster Styling team:

CHARMAINE DEPASQUALE

With over 15 years experience in fashion and styling Charmaine DePasquale is well sought after, As a celebrity stylist she has many clients which range from Rove McManus, Ruby Rose, Kate Ceberano, Julia Morris as well as personal clients who request her trusted expertise.

Charmaine began her extensive fashion-focussed career by designing and creating her own label 'de charmaine'; quality high end creations winning many awards and accolades at Spring Racing carnivals. The label was also demanded by celebrities and PR for functions, events and press.

Her passion and creativity for fashion led her to tackle the challenges of televisions, working on such shows as ROVE, Dancing With The Stars, Australia's Got Talent, and X-Factor as well as styling for The Herald Sun and for international celebrities such as Eva Longoria.

As a personal stylist Charmaine's relaxed and easy-going personality quickly allows her clients to feel confident and comfortable. Charmaine has a keen eye for detail, with the knowledge of shape and form to make her clients look amazing.

Fashion and clothing is fun, her motto is experiment, enjoy and love who you are and what you wear!

COST 2 Hour Personal Styling $300 (includes Valet parking and light refreshments) 4 Hour Personal Styling $550 (includes Valet parking and light refreshments) 4 Hour Group Styling Session $800: 2 to 4 people (includes Valet parking and light refreshments) 6 Hour Group Styling Session $1200: 2 to 4 people (includes Valet parking and light refreshments)

LUCY KIRALY

Lucy has over 30 years experience in television and the fashion industry. Lucy harnesses her years of practical experience, coupled with a warm, inclusive approach to ensure that her clients have both an enjoyable and successful experience that leaves them feeling beautifully dressed, confident and very special.

Lucy's approach to styling is a holistic one. She tackles the total look, including hair and makeup, does a thorough analysis of body shape and colours before venturing out shopping. Lucy has dressed many famous people in her day and loves nothing more than transforming a client and empowering them to style themselves. A key eye for the latest looks and a thorough understanding of budgets in her speciality. She tailors shopping expeditions to cost effectively compliment and refresh client's wardrobes..

Lucy is the director of The Fashion Team which produces runways shows as well as being the owner of Giant Management, a leading boutique model agency in Australia.

Lucy regularly writes fashion direction press releases and is often invited to lecture on current trends and run corporate style sessions.

COST 4 Hour Personal Styling $550 (includes Valet parking and light refreshments) 4 Hour Group Styling Session $800: 2 to 4 people (includes Valet parking and light refreshments) 6 Hour Group Styling Session $1200: 2 to 4 people (includes Valet parking and light refreshments)

MICHELLE CAMMIADE Michelle Cammiade is a fashion and lifestyle stylist. She started her career working as a costume and set designer 15 years ago, before honing her skills dressing celebrities in the Channel 9 wardrobe department. For many years, Michelle worked as the publication stylist for The Age, working on both the paper and its magazine, producing weekly fashion shoots and lifestyle pages. Before forging a successful freelance career styling countless advertising shoots for the likes of Levis, David Jones, Sportsgirl and Myer; More recently Michelle styled fashion parades for Melbourne Spring Fashion Week and the Spring Racing Carnival.

Michelle combines her graceful, relaxed personality with a keen eye for style to help clients achieve their goals. She will help you put together beautiful wardrobe options for all occasions or workshop practical, affordable style ideas for the complete capsule wardrobe.

COST 2 Hour Personal Styling $300 (includes Valet parking and light refreshments) 4 Hour Personal Styling $550 (includes Valet parking and light refreshments) 4 Hour Group Styling Session $800: 2 to 4 people (includes Valet parking and light refreshments) 6 Hour Group Styling Session $1200: 2 to 4 people (includes Valet parking and light refreshments)

VICTORIA TOMARO Victoria has worked as a freelance stylist for over 10 years, sharing her love for fashion and personal flair. Her superb sense of style and ability to understand body shape, sets her in high regards as one of Melbourne's top stylists.

She has appeared on Channels 7's Today Tonight and Channel 9's Morning Show discussing fashion and trends. She has worked on fashion photo styling shoots, fashion events and conducted many make overs. She has worked with celebrities around Melbourne's fashion scene.

She is also adept at forecasting trends and showing clients the best style to suit them. It's Victoria's understanding of each client's needs and her warm and friendly approach that guarantees she can create a desired look for any occasion, taking into consideration shape, size and function.

COST 2 Hour Personal Styling $300 (includes Valet parking and light refreshments) 4 Hour Personal Styling $550 (includes Valet parking and light refreshments) 4 Hour Group Styling Session $800: 2 to 4 people (includes Valet parking and light refreshments) 6 Hour Group Styling Session $1200: 2 to 4 people (includes Valet parking and light refreshments)

For a valet experience that's convenient and hassle-free Westfield Doncaster offers a Valet Parking Service - open from 8.30am everyday and accessed via Williamsons Road, near Myer.

The Valet Parking service costs $12 plus standard parking fees (parking fees apply after 3 hours).

There are 3 easy steps to follow:

1. Enter car park via Blue Carpark (entry via Williamsons Road, Myer).

2. Issue your keys to our Valet Attendant and they will give you a retrieval pass.

3. Return to the Valet Parking Lounge once you have finished shopping and they will retrieve your car for you.

Valet parking is safe, convenient and time saving - drive up to the door and let us take care of the rest! Valet Parking is the ultimate shopping indulgence at an affordable price.

Pre-Paid Valet Parking Vouchers Now Available. Every Valet customer receives a loyalty card which entitles you to every 6th visit free. Ask at the Valet Parking desk for more details.

Car Wash Service Need your car washed? The Valet Parking attendants can arrange that too. Car wash services start from just $49 (sedan) for an exterior wash including interior dust and vacuum.

Launched in November 2014 at Westfield Doncaster, InHabit is a standalone retail experience that allows designers, who are not otherwise represented within Westfield shopping centres, to showcase their own unique offer to a far-reaching customer base for a limited time. The unique structure, located on Level 1 in the High Fashion Precinct, will act as a gallery and retail space, for shoppers to view, engage and purchase fashion and accessories from a range of Australian designers. InHabit’s first designer in residence was none other than Kym Ellery, with her eponymous label ELLERY; an undisputed leading light within the Australian fashion industry. Kym Ellery which launched InHabit with ELLERY’s Resort 2015 collection, which received rave reviews both locally and internationally when unveiled in June. With a curated series of exciting retail concepts in place for 2015, each designer in residence will be in place for a maximum of six weeks. Dion Lee, Ginger and Smart, Bec & Bridge and Kit & Ace are all confirmed for residencies in 2015. InHabit was designed by Melbourne architect Matthew Herbert of award-winning architectural and design practice Herbert & Mason.

When it comes to booking a Personal Styling Session with one of our experienced stylists, it is all about choosing a stylist who best reflects your own personal style and interests. At Westfield, you are spoilt for choice with nine talented women who have an array of experience, skills and style, to suit all client needs. Sessions are $200 for two hours. Book a session today, call or email us and we can help find the right Stylist for you.

SARA HATTEN-MASTERSON

Sara Hatten-Masterson is renowned for her work and credibility within the industry, with over a decade of experience in style and image consulting.  With a desire to put the fun back into fashion and shopping, Sara curates versatile, stylish, personal and modern wardrobes for clients of all ages, genders, sizes and within any budget.

Her ground-breaking work in image and styling has been recognised through national and international publications and has resulted in demand for her services by celebrities and private clients alike.  She is an engaging speaker, creative director, and is in constant demand by community and corporate groups throughout Australia. 

LETICIA GASKELL

With nearly a decade of experience working within the fashion industry, Brisbane-based stylist Leticia Gaskell loves helping people create an individual style that accentuates their best features and expresses their personalities.

Leticia has worked with some of Australia’s leading fashion designers such as Sass & Bide, Scanlan & Theodore and Tallulah, and has styled events for magazines including Shop Til You Drop, Harper’s Bazaar, Elle, Grazia and Cosmopolitan.

CHRISTINE MARTIN

Always spotting a trend before it hits the stores, Christine Martin is the epitome of fresh and edgy with her fashion-forward approach. With a love for Australian and International designers, fine jewellery and minimalistic styling, Christine is the perfect go-to for chic wardrobe advice.

ALEX PATERSON

Alex Paterson’s passion for style, grace and elegance in fashion extends to how she likes to work with her Personal Styling clients. With great versatility in her client base, Alex aims to educate clients on how to dress for their shape, and works to create a wardrobe that meets the lifestyle of her client.

Adaptable and creative, Alex loves to mix high-end pieces with budget buys to create a well-balanced look, and will teach you all about finding the perfect accessory for your outfit.

JANET KEKI

Janet Keki has worked in the industry for nine years, moving through lifestyle PR and fashion publications, through to personal styling, and has the philosophy of piecing together high end with high street. Janet has a very personal approach to styling, aiming to understand what her client is trying to achieve and planning how to meet those needs efficiently, and is able to adhere to any budget.

Working with women of all ages, Janet can help you achieve the perfect school formal outfit or special occasion look, or can help you rework your current wardrobe.

MOLLY KING

Molly King is an Australian fashion stylist & creative director. She currently runs her personal fashion blog & instagram Foxy Zingaro and specialises in fashion editorial and campaign work for national and international clients. 

As one of Westfield’s stylists, Molly can create a complete look for a special occasion, or help you in your journey to re-style a wardrobe that is unique and relevant to you. Molly has worked with a wide repertoire of brands including Sabo Skirt, Samantha Wills, Asilio, Dylan Kain, The Iconic, Free People, Maurie & Eve and Wanted Shoes, highlighting her ability to create a dynamic mix of looks across genres.

ANNABEL FALCO

With over nine years’ experience in fashion styling and journalism working with the likes of Style Magazine, Mercedes Benz Fashion Festival and Mimco, just to name a few, Annabel Falco speaks the language of fashion like no other.

Having worked as a Westfield Personal Stylist for over two years, Annabel works to refine, restructure and reinvigorate her clients’ wardrobes to better suit their body shape and lifestyle.

ALLIE CODD

When Al isn’t working in the world of publishing and PR, you can find her styling fashion shoots and parades, hosting events and, of course, personally styling Westfield clients. 

With a relaxed, tailored and slightly masculine personal style, Allie teaches clients the rules of investment purchases vs. stylist steals and how to create your own signature looks.

JULES JACKSON

As a working mother with three children, Jules Jackson’s approach to styling is to understand the needs of her clients to create a wardrobe that effortlessly caters for all facets of their life – work, weekend, social events and in between.

Jules helps her clients maximise their wardrobe options by ensuring they have great basics that can be easily updated with new seasonal looks and can work with any budget, allowing you to get the best results possible from your Personal Styling Session.

With over 20 years’ experience in the fashion industry in both Brisbane and Melbourne, Jules aims to share her fashion knowledge with her clients to help them understand body shape and interpret trends to suit their own style.

Ticketless parking is now in operation at Westfield Hurstville. By allowing you to park without the need for a paper ticket, parking will be quicker and easier than ever before.

*FREE PARKING PROMOTION

For a limited time only, you are eligible to receive an extra free hour’s parking each time you visit Westfield Hurstville. See parkwestfield.com.au for details.

HOW IT WORKS

1. There is no boom gate at entry, so you can drive straight into the car park. There will be a digital clock displaying your time of entry - remember the time you entered as you will not be issued with a paper ticket.

2a. Upon leaving the shopping centre, if your visit to the car park is within the 3 hours free parking period provided, proceed straight to the exit. The parking system will recognise your licence plate number and the boom gate will automatically open.

2b. If your visit to the car park is over the 3 hours free parking period provided, head to one of the many pay stations, enter your licence plate number and pay the parking fee. Drive to the exit where the system will recognise your parking payment and the boom gate will open automatically. If you exit the centre, there must be 30 minutes between exit and re-entry in order to receive another ‘3 hours free parking’ period.

2c. Alternatively, you can register at parkwestfield.com.au to have your parking fee automatically deducted from your credit card.

BENEFITS OF REGISTERING

Save time, drive in and out without visiting the pay station. Simply register with your credit card and when you exit the car park after your stay, your parking fee will be automatically deducted from your card. Register at parkwestfield.com.au.

HOW DO I KNOW HOW MUCH TIME I HAVE LEFT?

Check your entry time on the digital clock at each car park entry upon arrival.

During your visit you can check your elapsed parking time by typing your licence plate into one of the many pay stations and digital directories in the centre.

Full conditions of entry are displayed throughout the car park. FAQs TERMS & CONDITIONS

PARKING RATES

Westfield Hurstville offers up to 3 hours free parking. We operate a ticketless parking system with licence plate recognition, which means that there is no need for you to take a ticket on entry.

After 3 hours has been reached, the following rates apply:

Time for a new look? Whether it's for that special occasion or you want to introduce the wow factor into your wardrobe, book a Personal Style Session with a Westfield Stylist.

After giving your stylist the lowdown on what you're looking for they'll go through your personalised style - which pinpoints everything from your body shape to the perfect make-up shades for you - and give you some top tips and advice. The best bit? They'll take you to the stores that can make it happen.

RESIDENT STYLIST - LISA FOWLER

Lisa has worked in the fashion industry for more than 20 years and has an amazing creative eye and passion for styling, along with a talent for putting together key looks incorporating the latest styles, colours, materials and patterns. Through completing a Certificate in Styling she gained a great understanding of what styles work best for all body shapes and sizes. Being a working Mum, Lisa understands the needs of her client’s lifestyle and loves working with each individual to tailor a fabulous look to suit.

Hourly Rate: $65 per hour (min. 2 hour booking. 1 hour bookings available, subject to stylist availability.)

Book your session today by visiting the Concierge Desk or emailing us at innaloomarketing@scentregroup.com with your name, preferred date, session time and which fabulous stylist you would like to see!

For all our cycling enthusiasts and lycra loving customers Westfield Innaloo now offers a Bike Repair Station.

This wheely convenient service allows you to tighten your bolts, pump your tyres and patch your punctures before you hop back on the saddle!

You'll find our Bike Repair Station at the entrance closest to Footlocker!

Westfield Knox is proud to partner with local charity; Scope. Scope is a a not-for-profit organisation that exists to support people with physical, intellectual and multiple disabilities achieve their goals in life. With services that help more than 6000 individuals and their families across Victoria, they provide support when and where you need it, whether it’s in your home, at school, in the community or at one of their 99 service locations. Scope are passionate about providing high-quality support that is individualised to each child's needs. Throughout the year, we hold a number of events which give our shoppers the opportunity to donate to this amazing organisation - keep an eye on our Events page to see when these are held.

WESTFIELD STYLIST KATE KOHLER

Newcastle based personal stylist Kate Kohler is your go-to-girl for all things wardrobe related. With a keen eye for fashion and the latest trends, Kate understands what it is clients are looking for. "I love helping clients feel confident about themselves. It’s not always about the fashion. It’s about you and finding the right look within your lifestyle and budget."

Kate is available for one-on-one personal style session bookings and her services include:

  • 2 hour Personal Style Session: $180
  • 3 hour Personal Style Session: $270

All personal style sessions of 2 hours or more come with a complimentary 1 hour Napoleon Perdis Makeover* and five hours free parking.

Personal Style Sessions with Kate are available year round - contact us today to book in your preferred time. For enquiries and bookings please visit the Concierge Desk, located on Level 2 outside JB Hi-Fi or email kotaramarketing@scentregroup.com

(Excludes Public Holidays, Special Events and December)

Parking Guidance System

Westfield Liverpool’s new Parking Guidance System now directs you to the best parking spots from the moment you arrive.

As you enter the car park you simply follow the signs that direct you to the level with the closest available parking space. Then, look for the coloured lights that indicate whether the parking space is available – it’s that easy!

How it works

Green light – available space

White light – parking with prams

Blue light – disabled parking

Red light – occupied space

Auto Pay. A New and Better Way to Park.

Westfield Liverpool's Auto Pay means no more waiting in a long queue at the exit gate - because you finalise your parking before you get back to your car.

How it works:

Collect your ticket as you enter the car park. Make sure you take your ticket with you.

Take note of your nearest Auto Pay Station on your way into the Centre.

When you have finished your shopping, remember to check your ticket at any Auto Pay Station before returning to your car.

Proceed to exit and insert your ticket at any exit column.

Westfield's easy-to-use Auto Pay Stations take cash as well as all major credit cards. All exit booths will be automatic and unmanned.

Ticketless parking is now in operation at Westfield Miranda. By allowing you to park without the need for a paper ticket, parking will be quicker and easier than ever before. See parking rates below.

*FREE PARKING PROMOTION

For a limited time only, you are eligible to receive an extra free hour’s parking each time you visit Westfield Miranda. See parkwestfield.com.au for details.

HOW IT WORKS

1. There is no boom gate at entry, so you can drive straight into the car park. There will be a digital clock displaying your time of entry - remember the time you entered as you will not be issued with a paper ticket.

2a. Upon leaving the shopping centre, if your visit to the car park is within the 3 hours free parking period provided, proceed straight to the exit. The parking system will recognise your licence plate number and the boom gate will automatically open.

2b. If your visit to the car park is over the 3 hours free parking period provided, head to one of the many pay stations, enter your licence plate number and pay the parking fee. Drive to the exit where the system will recognise your parking payment and the boom gate will open automatically. If you exit the centre, there must be 30 minutes between exit and re-entry in order to receive another ‘3 hours free parking’ period.

2c. Alternatively, you can register at parkwestfield.com.au to have your parking fee automatically deducted from your credit card.

BENEFITS OF REGISTERING

Save time, drive in and out without visiting the pay station. Simply register with your credit card and when you exit the car park after your stay, your parking fee will be automatically deducted from your card.

RECEIVE AN EXTRA FREE HOUR'S PARKING EACH VISIT

For a limited time only, you are eligible to receive an extra free hour’s parking each time you visit Westfield Miranda. To take advantage of this offer, simply register for Ticketless Parking with your credit card between 1st August 2016 – 31st October 2016 and you will automatically receive 4 hours of free parking for you to enjoy during this period. If you have already registered for Ticketless Parking with your credit card, you will also automatically receive 4 hours of free parking each visit to shop your favourite stores. To help you monitor your parking time whilst shopping, simply enter your licence plate number by visiting any Centre Directory or Automatic Pay Machine. Conditions Apply. Not Applicable for re-entry within 30 minutes of exit. Visit parkwestfield.com.au to register or for more information about the promotion and full Terms & Conditions..

Register at parkwestfield.com.au.

HOW DO I KNOW HOW MUCH TIME I HAVE LEFT?

Check your entry time on the digital clock at each car park entry upon arrival.

During your visit you can check your elapsed parking time by typing your licence plate into one of the many pay stations and digital directories in the centre.

Full conditions of entry are displayed throughout the car park. FAQs TERMS & CONDITIONS

PARKING RATES

Westfield Miranda offers up to 3 hours free parking. We operate a ticketless parking system with licence plate recognition, which means that there is no need for you to take a ticket on entry.

You are entitled to 3 hours free parking on your first entry into the car park. When returning to the car park in the same day you will only receive an additional 3 hours free parking if your time of car park re-entry is more than 30 minutes after your previous car park exit.

FREE PARKING WITH ENTRY AFTER 6PM

Enter after 6pm and exit before 1am. Excludes Public Holidays and Special Events. Entry prior to 6pm will incur parking charges at the standard rates.

CINEMA PARKING

Allow more time for shopping with our Valet Parking service.

At only $10* Monday - Friday and $15* Saturday, Sunday and Public Holidays, Valet Parking is the ultimate shopping indulgence at an affordable price.

There are 3 easy steps to follow:

  1. Enter car park via Kingsway entrance closest to Wandella Rd.

  2. Issue your keys to our Valet Attendant and they will give you a retrieval passport.

  3. Return to the Valet Parking Lounge once you have finished shopping and they will retrieve your car for you.

    Additional Valet Services: Ask our Valet staff about our HandsFree Shopping Service.

    *Additional charges apply after 3 hours.

Valet Parking Hours

Monday - Wednesday 9.30am - 6pm

Thursday 9.30am - 9pm

Friday 9.30am - 6pm

Saturday 9am - 6pm

Sunday 10am - 6pm

Our Handsfree Shopping service takes the strain away whilst you continue shopping, dining or catching up with friends. You don’t have to carry your shopping with you - we’ll take care of it for you.

To use this exclusive service:

    1. Register when you arrive at Valet and receive your Handsfree Shopping pass.
    2. When you make a purchase, quote your Valet pass to the retailer to log your shopping with our Handsfree Shopping Service.
    3. Whilst you continue to shop, our customer service team will collect your shopping and store them in Valet for you.

Regular parking charges apply.

The Valet Lounge is located on Green Basement Level 1, accessible via the travelator near Woolworths.

Want to pamper a friend, family member, or perhaps yourself?

Westfield Miranda provides exclusive access to some of the world's leading fashion brands and Australian designers. Our Stylists can connect you with the very latest fashion trends, must-have accessories or even just draw out and enhance your own natural individuality.

Taking advantage of the luxurious Westfield Suite - it is the perfect reward and most sublime indulgence.

MEET THE STYLISTS

ADRIANA FERNANDEZ

Adriana Fernandez is a Personal Fashion Stylist that works closely with her clients to create a unique styling experience that is designed to help individuals define their own distinctive image and style.Adriana brings with her over 25 years of experience in the women’s and men’s fashion industry and has styled fashion parades, photo shoots, hair expos, corporate events and many private clients. She works closely with her clients to understand their needs and their budget and delivers style solutions that suit their body shape and lifestyle and accentuating their best features.Her wealth of experience as well as her passion for beauty, fashion and style helps to bring out the best in people and makes them feel great by empowering her clients with the skills and understanding to dress fashionably now and into the future.Adriana’s philosophy is simple “look good to feel great” and her approach to fashion styling is positive and sincere.

YVONNE WALLACE

Yvonne Wallace has been working in the fashion industry for over 8 years. She recently started teaching fashion consulting, styling and visual merchandising at a Sydney fashion college and really enjoys connecting with others by sharing her wealth of knowledge. Yvonne’s very strong eye for detail ensures every aspect of your lifestyle and personality are reflected in your wardrobe. Yvonne will help you discover your own unique personal style with enthusiasm, leaving you feel confident and capable! Yvonne's love of fashion and travel has seen her across the globe, and in turn keeps her up-to-date with the latest trends adapting them for the Australian way of life.

Yvonne as worked witha number of high profile brands such as Westfield, CLEO, SHOP, InStyle, David Jones, Runway Shows, Myer VM Consultant and more.

Phone battery about to die?

Thanks to Virgin Mobile, you can now recharge your mobile phone using free phone charge lockers, now available at Westfield Miranda in the Food Court on Level 1.

Simply stash your phone in a charge locker, choose your pin, then keep shopping while your phone gets an energy boost!

Visit virginmobile.com.au or find us in-store

Carpark Changes Westfield Mt Druitt has taken positive action to provide customers with increased convenience as the battle for parking continues to increase. Located adjacent to the local railway station at Mt Druitt, Westfield Mt Druitt has long accommodated the high number of commuters unable to find parking spaces in the adjacent council car park. Unfortunately, this has come at the cost of regular shopper’s convenience and ease of finding a car space in our carpark. In an effort to find a balance for shoppers and all day parkers, Westfield Mt Druitt has begun security patrols of prime car spaces during the peak morning commuter period of 6.00am – 9.30am Monday to Friday, restricting access only to our shoppers and diverting all day parkers to underutilised areas of the car park. Complimentary parking available for all customers.

At Westfield Mt Druitt, we offer FREE parking spaces for your entire day shopping at Westfield.

We also cater for Parents with Prams, Disabled Shoppers, Seniors and Express Parking, as well as shaded parking in the Coles carpark.

The main car park entrances are located on North Parade, Carlisle Avenue and Luxford Road.

FOR ALL UPDATES ON THE NEW TICKETLESS PARKING SYSTEM AT WESTFIELD NORTH LAKES PLEASE CLICK HERE

While we're working to bring you a bigger and better Westfield North Lakes, some of our car parks will change to allow for construction.

DEVELOPMENT UPDATE 29TH SEPTEMBER 2016

Construction on your new Mall is underway and on track for opening later this year.

As part of the development, road access around the back of the centre is now permanently closed to make way for 60 new specialty stores, KMART, IKEA and additional parking.

For access to rooftop parking, please use the existing ramp (accessible from Prospect Terrace) or the new ramp (accessible from North Lakes Drive).

We appreciate your patience while we work to build a bigger and better Westfield North Lakes.

CLICK HERE FOR MAP

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CAR PARK CHANGES TIMELINE

12.11.15 The new ramp to the rooftop has opened at the Woolworths end of the centre.

13.10.15 The Target car park has closed to allow for the link mall to be built from IKEA to the existing centre with 60 brand new stores, plus additional new undercover car parking set to open in November 2016. The ring road opened allowing access from the front to the back of the centre next to Woolworths. This was closed off due to construction of the new rooftop ramp.

25.09.15 The undercover car park next to Dan Murphys is now open.

24.09.15 A brand new dedicated staff and contractor car park has opened opposite the IKEA construction site. All centre staff and contractors will be directed to park here until further notice.

09.09.15 A small section of the Woolworths car park has been closed and access to along the side of the shopping centre has been restricted to make way for the new ramp to the rooftop. Access is now via the ring road and through Prospect St.

Westfield North Lakes offer a FREE Justice of the Peace Service.

PLEASE NOTE: The Justice of the Peace service will be relocated to the corridor beside Woolworths as on Monday 16th May 2016. 

This service is available: Monday - Friday 10:30AM -2:30PM

Thursday evening 6:30PM – 8:00PM

Saturday 9:30AM – 12:00PM

Please note due to unforeseen circumstances JP's may not be available. If urgent please ring to confirm.

At Westfield Parramatta we offer FREE parking for the first 3 hours!
Lost tickets incur the maximum daily charge. Free parking with entry after 7pm (excluded public holidays, December and special events).

Westfield Parramatta is easily accessible by car. The centre is conveniently located in the heart of Parramatta's CBD with entries to the car park located on Aird Street, Marsden Street and Campbell Street. With over 4500 parking spaces and 3 hours free parking, a visit to Westfield Parramatta couldn't be easier.

OPERATIONAL HOURS
- Campbell Street parking station (ramp leads to Woolworths), 4:00am - 1:00am.
- Campbell Street parking station (entrance leads to Valet Parking and other levels), 7:00am - 1:00am.
- Aird Street parking station (best entrance for Coles), 7:00am - 10:00pm

EARLY BIRD PARKING
Park from 6am for just $12 a day!
Plus receive a FREE coffee at Michel's Patisserie L5! Simply present your Early Bird Parking ticket.
Located on Level 5 upper car park. Enter via Campbell Street and follow the ‘Early Bird' signs.

Terms and Conditions
Entry between 6am-10am, Monday - Friday. Exit after 3pm. Excludes public holidays, December and special events. Full conditions of entry are displayed at the entrance to the car park.

Allow more time for shopping with our Valet Parking service. At only $10*, Valet Parking is the ultimate shopping indulgence at an affordable price. Simply drive your car into the Valet Parking directly from Campbell Street, hand your keys to our Valet Parking attendant and you're free to shop!

When you've finished shopping, all you have to do is return to the Valet Lounge, take a seat and you'll have your car brought to you while you relax. The attendant will even help you pack your shopping - it's that simple!

Plus, now buy your Westfield Gift Cards at Valet!

*Offer available for a limited time only. Normal parking fees apply. First three hours free.

WESTFIELD GIFT CARDS

1. Ensure your wireless enabled laptop or Smart Phone is turned on and has its wireless signal activated.

2. Go to Available Wireless Network Collection List

3. Select "_WestfieldFreeWiFi" from the list. You may need to select 'Connect'

4. On the welcome screen enter your details and accept the Terms and Conditions to access Free WiFi. The Terms and Conditions must be accepted before you can use the Free WiFi service.

5. Once the Terms and Conditions are accepted, you will be taken to the Free WiFi launch page and you can use your free WiFi.

Let our Resident Stylist, Liv Rahme, inspire you. Whether you are rejoining the workforce, need a wardrobe makeover or would like some tips on this season's trends, our personal style sessions can help you on your way. Perfect for a gift idea, a girl's day out, to transform your man or spoil yourself, personal style sessions can be tailored to meet your needs.

RESIDENT STYLIST: Liv Rahmé One of the youngest and hardest working stylists ascending up the high-fashion ladder in her Louboutins; Liv was trained by the best of the best- hand-picked by the Harper’s Bazaar fashion team to assist them across the board, and then transferred to Vogue when editorial changes were made. Liv has also worked along side styling veterans Kelvin Harries, Jo Ferguson, and Nicole Bonython Hines, and has worked on the wardrobe team for Katy Perry, Hayley Hasselhoff, 5 Seconds of Summer and Havana Brown, to name a few.

Liv’s styling work has also been featured in a variety of lookbooks, campaigns and editorials; and some of her clients and collaborators include Louis Vuitton and Women’s Health and Fitness Mag where she worked as the Assistant Fashion Editor. Liv will offer expert advice on this season's trends, and how you can achieve them by incorporating key pieces into your everyday wardrobe.

Offered as personal, pair or group sessions, contact us at pmarketing2@scentregroup.com or (02) 8892 5200 to enquire on availability.

PRICES: 2 hour personal style session: $180

3 hour personal style session: $270

4 hour personal style session: $360

Group Style Session (3 hours, max 5 people): $270

Wardrobe Style Session (4 hours): $360

You can now enjoy a little luxury with our Handsfree Shopping Service. 

Our Handsfree Shopping Service takes the strain away whilst you continue shopping, dining or catching up with friends. You don't have to carry your shopping with you - we'll take care of it for you! 

To use this exclusive service:

  1. Our Handsfree Shopping Service is $5, no matter how many bags you have.
  2. When you make a purchase, let the retailer know to log your shopping with our Handsfree Shopping Service*
  3. Whilst you continue to shop, our Service Team will collect your shopping and deliver it to the Valet Lounge. If you prefer, you can contact 8892 5201 or 8895 5228 and we will collect your shopping from your location. 
  4. On arrival to Valet, let our friendly staff know you have used the service and they will do the rest.

The Valet Lounge is located on Level 4 carpark, entry via Campbell Street. 

*Supermarkets not included.

Get in touch by calling a Concierge Desk or sending us an email.

Make your shopping trip fun for the kids. Concierge offers Kiddy Cars to keep the little ones entertained all day! Kiddy Cars can be hired from Concierge.

Kiddy Car Prices

$5.00 per hour for a single seat Kiddy Car

$7.50 per hour for a double seat Kiddy Car

Simply fill out a hire agreement form and present a valid Drivers License and the Kiddy Car is yours for the day.

Please note that the service is offered on a first-come, first-served basis, and Kiddy Car drivers must be over 12 months old and no taller than 100cm for a Kiddy Car. For safety reasons, an adult must accompany the child at all times.

Motorised mobility scooters are available for hire to make the most of your trip.

Mobility scooters can be booked free of charge for a maximum of three hours. Simply complete a hire agreement form and show approved proof of identification, which should be either a valid passport, driver's license or proof of age card.

Due to popularity of this service, it is recommended that you call ahead to book in advance.

sydney.description: Want to get in touch? Please call our Concierge Desk or send us an email.

CONCIERGE DESK

Westfield Sydney has established itself as Australia's leading retail icon. Positioned in the heart of the Sydney CBD, Westfield Sydney hosts some of the world's most exclusive and luxurious brands. Through our unique position as Sydney's premier dining, fashion and lifestyle precinct, we can offer you access to an exclusive range of services designed to make business easier.

We are all about making memorable experiences happen.

For more information on the full selection of services available listed below, please contact Westfield Sydney Concierge by phone or westfieldsydneyreception@au.westfield.com.

For a shopping experience that's convenient and hassle-free, Westfield Sydney offers valet parking, accessible via 135 King Street. Valet Parking is safe, convenient and time-saving. Simply drive up to the door, issue your keys to the attendant, and let us take care of the rest. Open from 6am on weekdays, and 8:30am on weekends. Rates start from $20 per hour during the day and $15 per hour with entry after 6pm. Click here to view all parking rates.

Need your car washed? The Valet Parking attendants can arrange that too. Car wash services start from just $35 (sedan) for an exterior wash. A same day service is available if you book before 10.30am. Book directly at the Valet Desk on arrival, or to book in advance and for further enquiries please call or email us.

Car wash services start from just $35 (sedan) for an exterior wash. A same day service is available if you book before 10.30am.

Book directly at the Valet Desk on arrival, or to book in advance and for further enquiries please call or email us.

Want to pamper a friend, family member, or perhaps yourself?

Westfield Sydney provides exclusive access to some of the world's leading luxury brands and Australian designers. Over a complimentary glass of champagne, our Stylists can connect you with the very latest fashion trends, must-have accessories or even just draw out and enhance your own natural individuality.

Taking advantage of the luxurious Westfield Suite - it is the perfect reward and most sublime indulgence. 

CLICK HERE TO FIND OUT MORE

The Westfield Suite, conveniently located on Level 6 of Westfield Sydney, is a unique and elegant multi-purpose function space available for hire. The Suite is a flexible event space with different layout options and catering available.

The space includes a main lounge area, two large optional change-rooms, a reception space and a kitchenette allowing the flexibility to host of range of functions including:

  • Styling sessions
  • Client conferences
  • Staff Workshops
  • Lifestyle events
  • Product launches
  • Business Conferences

Thanks to Westfield and Optus, you can use up to 3 hours or 1GB of free data every day. To access free WiFi at Westfield Sydney follow these steps:

3. Select "_WestfieldFreeWiFi" from the list. You may need to select 'Connect'

4. Once the welcome screen appears, enter your details and select “Connect to WiFi”. By Connecting to the WiFi you agree to the Terms and Conditions and Westfield Privacy Policy.

5. Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy for the Free WiFi Service are available on the login page

To hire a mobility vehicle, you will need proof of identification, which should be either a valid passport, driver's license or proof of age card. On presentation of these, you'll be asked to fill out a hire agreement form. Once that's done, you're ready to go.

Visit our concierge desks on Level 2 or Level 6 to collect your pram, wheelchair or scooter. All vehicles are subject to availability.

Coming soon to Westfield Sydney: a bespoke and convenient dry-cleaning service. Simply drop your items off at Concierge or when you enter Valet, and have your items ready for collection when you are ready to leave. Same-day and next day services will be available.

Coming soon to Westfield Sydney: Order a beautiful bunch of fresh blooms, delicately arranged to your liking. Collect from Concierge or Valet, or allow our team to arrange delivery to your preferred location.

Parking is FREE when you enter the car park AFTER 6PM and exit BEFORE 6am the next day.

DISABILITY PERMIT HOLDERS
Westfield provides FREE parking for Disability Permit Holders.
Present your Government issued disability permit at the Concierge Desk located near Harris Scarfe to register and receive a tag.

You will then be able to validate your parking if you have exceeded the 3 hour free period. This can be done at any of the pay stations located at the mall entry points.

How to validate your ticket:
1. Insert your parking ticket into the yellow insert area at the Pay Station.
2. A charge will appear onscreen if you have exceeded the 3 hour free period.
3. Hold your disability key tag 5 inches away from the red flashing light at the bottom of the pay station. Ensure barcode is facing towards the light.
4. The charge will be voided and your validated ticket will eject.
5. Proceed to the exit gate.

Conditions of entry are displayed throughout the car park. See parking terms and conditions here

Buy Now or Redeem at these stores

Thanks to Westfield and Optus, you can use up to 180 minutes or 1GB of free data every day. To access free WiFi at Westfield Whitford City follow these steps: 1. Ensure your wireless enabled laptop or Smart Phone is turned on and has its wireless signal activated. 2. Go to Available Wireless Network Collection List 3. Select "_WestfieldFreeWiFi" from the list. You may need to select 'Connect' 4. On the welcome screen enter your details and accept the Terms and Conditions to access Free WiFi. The Terms and Conditions must be accepted before you can use the Free WiFi service. 5. Once the Terms and Conditions are accepted, you will be taken to the Free WiFi launch page and you can use your free WiFi.
whitfordcity.long_title: Free WiFi, brought to you by Optus

whitfordcity.description:
Time for a new look? Whether it's for that special occasion or you want to introduce the wow factor into your wardrobe, book a Personal Style Session with a Westfield Stylist.

After giving your stylist the lowdown on what you're looking for they'll go through your personalised style - which pinpoints everything from your body shape to the perfect make-up shades for you - and give you some top tips and advice. The best bit? They'll take you to the stores that can make it happen.

SENIOR STYLIST - ADY ORUPE

Ady has worked as a fashion make-up artist and hair stylist for 15 years, and started styling 10 years ago after demands from clients. Her knowledge, skills and passion in making women look and feel amazing has given her an excellent reputation on the Perth fashion scene.

As a mother of four, Ady understands a woman's hectic lifestyle, battles with body shape and how to dress to enhance what you love and hide what you don’t. Ady will keep you on trend and on budget, whatever your lifestyle!

Hourly Rate: $90 per hour (min. 2 hour booking. 1 hour bookings available, subject to stylist availability.)

RESIDENT STYLIST - LISA FOWLER

Lisa has worked in the fashion industry for more than 20 years and has an amazing creative eye and passion for styling, along with a talent for putting together key looks incorporating the latest styles, colours, materials and patterns. Through completing a Certificate in Styling she gained a great understanding of what styles work best for all body shapes and sizes. Being a working Mum, Lisa understands the needs of her client’s lifestyle and loves working with each individual to tailor a fabulous look to suit.

Hourly Rate: $65 per hour (min. 2 hour booking. 1 hour bookings available, subject to stylist availability.)

Book your session today by visiting the Concierge Desk or emailing us at whitfordcitymarketing@scentregroup.com with your name, preferred date, session time and which fabulous stylist you would like to see!
Our permanent children's Playworld is located down the Target mall, opposite Ally Fashion. All children are welcome and entry is free, however children must be supervised at all times.

At Westfield Whitford City, we offer free parking for your entire day shopping at Westfield.
There are parking lots both undercover and outdoor, and we cater for Parents with Prams, Disabled Shoppers, Families and Seniors.

We have conveniently located lots available near the Fresh Food precinct and all major retailers such as Target, Big W, Woolworths and Coles. You will also find various fast-food restaurants close-by.

Please note that unless otherwise sign posted, parking near the centre has a limit of 4 hours.
Parking very close to entrances will normally have shorter time restrictions. They range from 15 minutes (near banks, postal services) to 90 minutes near Fresh Food. For any queries or further information please do not hesitate to contact us via phone on (08) 9308 2751

woden.description:
At Westfield Woden, shopping is a pleasurable and relaxing experience for the whole family, if you have any questions or comments, please visit the Concierge Desk on Level 2, located in between Mazzucchelli's and Michael Hill.

Receive all your customer service questions answered and make the most of the following services:

  • Corporate Gift Cards
  • Consumer Gift Cards
  • Free 3hr wheelchair
  • power shopper and stroller hire
  • 1 hour extension on parking for disability permit holders

For inquiries and collection of mobility services please contact the Concierge Desk.

There are three car parks that service Westfield Woden Shopping Centre; Keltie St Carpark, Callum St Carpark and Neptune St Carpark. All have a height limit of 2.2 metres.

FIND THE BEST PARKING FOR YOU
Fresh Food: Corrina Street Car Park
Cinemas, Food Court & Trade Secret: Callam Street Car Park
David Jones, JB Hi-Fi, Monthly Parking Card Holders & Early Bird: Neptune Street Car Park
Lost tickets incur the daily maximum rate.

PARKING RATES
Westfield Woden offers 2 Hours FREE parking everyday and FREE parking Sundays.

Time Weekday Weekend

2.0 - 2.5hrs $2.00 $2.00

4.0 - 4.5hrs $10.00 $10.00

Maximum Daily Rate $30.00 $30.00
Overnight Fee $30.00 $30.00

2 HOURS FREE PARKING VALID ONCE PER DAY ONLY

EARLY BIRD PARKING
$8.00 Early Bird Parking
Park undercover in Neptune Street Car Park for a flat rate of $8.00 between Monday to Friday.
Must enter between 6:30am and 9:00am and exit between 3:30pm and 6:00pm

PREMIUM UNDERCOVER PARKING
$170 per month ($8.50 Per Day)
Park undercover in Neptune Street Car Park for a flat rate of $170 per month with unlimited entries and exits 24 hours / 7 days per week.

CINEMA PARKING Take your movie and parking ticket to the Hoyts ticket desk to receive ONE extra hour of parking free from the time of ticket entry. (Total of four hours free from time of ticket entry).

To apply see Westfield Concierge, level 2.

The Westfield Woden playworld is available for children to use during centre hours. The Woden Playworld is located outside JB HiFi. 

Children must be supervised while using the play equipment.

Are you wanting to host a business meeting or team training session but nowhere to hold it? 

Westfield Woden can help you. We have a full sized Conference Centre to suit your needs, including training rooms, meeting rooms, boardroom, kitchenette and catering options available.

Contact the Concierge desk for further information & availability.

WESTFIELD GIFT CARDS
