Gift Cards can be purchased from Centre Concierge Desks or online.

Buy Now or Redeem at these stores

albany.description:
JUST WHAT THEY’VE ALWAYS WANTED

A Westfield Gift Card is the perfect gift, reward or incentive. Gift Cards are available from the Customer Service Desk and can be loaded with any amount from $10 - $995. The Gift Cards can be used in hundreds of shops in Westfield shopping centres across New Zealand - so there’s something for everybody.

Buy a Westfield Gift Card

PERSONAL STYLING SESSIONS

Have a big event ahead, want to update your look, heading back to work, or just want to find out what works for you?

Personal Styling Sessions provide you with a one-on-one guide to style. In two hours a Westfield Stylist of your choice will assess your shape, style, colouring and budget, then take you to the right stores to try on the right pieces.

After a session you’ll be left with the skills to build the perfect capsule wardrobe and all the personalised advice you’ll need to maintain it – no matter what the season or occasion.

Personal Styling Sessions are available Monday to Sunday during normal shopping hours all year round.

Prices start from $230 for two hours.

Meet the stylists and book your session

GROUP STYLING SESSIONS

Do you and your friends have a big event coming up, want to update your looks for the new season, or find out what works for your individual bodies?

Group Styling Sessions provide an intimate, personalised guide to style for small groups of two to four people.

In two to three hours a Westfield stylist will assess your body shape, style, colouring and budget, then take you to the right stores to try on the right pieces.

After a session you and your friends will be left with the skills to build the perfect capsule wardrobe and all the personalised advice you’ll need to maintain it – no matter what the season or occasion.

Group Styling Sessions are available Monday to Sunday during normal shopping hours all year round.

Prices start from $320 for two hours for two people.

Find out more and book your session

Discover the new Westfield app and find what you need faster. Whether at home or in centre, Westfield is your on the go shopping assistant guaranteed to make your visit to any Westfield shopping centre more enjoyable.

Download the app today and check out a variety of helpful features that will allow you to make the most of your in centre shopping experience.

  • Use our intuitive maps to find where you are in centre and get routed step-by-step to where you want to go.
  • Browse centre and store info
  • Discover retailers and restaurants
  • Find exclusive deals and events
  • View show times, watch trailers, and buy movie tickets
  • Conveniently save your favourite deals and retailers to view later

Download for free from the App Store and Google Play

For your convenience, Westfield Albany has free customer car parking for up to four hours (P240) in the majority of the Centre car parks. There are also one and a half hour (P90) parking zones for more convenient shopping. These are all marked accordingly.

FREE EXTENDED PARKING COUPON

If you think you will be shopping for a while then park in the P240 area, as this will give you 4 free hours of parking. However, if you think you’ll be longer than this please get an extended parking coupon from our Customer Service Desk. The extended parking coupon will last for the whole day, however it needs to be displayed on your dashboard. Car parks are for the use of Westfield Albany customers only, so please don't be offended if you are subsequently asked to verify that you have been shopping at the Centre.

PARKING INFRINGEMENT NOTICE

If you exceed the time limit in the designated parking zone, you will be issued with an infringement notice and a $50 fee by Parking Enforcement Services. Payment is required within 21 days - please see the back of the notice for details. If you were shopping for more than four hours in a P240 car park, please get in touch with us. If you would like to appeal, simply write to Parking Enforcement Services, PO Box 8290 Symonds Street Auckland, and let them know why you are appealing. They can be contacted on 0800 727 536.

PARKING WITH PRAMS

At Westfield Albany, we want to make shopping easier for those with young children. Just pull into one of our specially marked Parents with Prams parking spots, located close to the entrances of the Centre.

At Westfield Albany we have wheelchairs and mobility scooters available for hire. Just visit the Customer Services Desk on Level 2 for more information. There is no charge for hireage but you will require photo ID and terms and conditions apply.

PARENTS ROOMS
Looking after your little ones will always be a pleasure at Westfield because our Parents Rooms are equipped with a microwave, bottle warmer, change tables and kids toilets... all in a safe and comfortable environment. And of course, Dads are also welcome in all our Parents Rooms.

Our Parents Rooms are located on Level 2 behind the Foodcourt and Level 1 to the rear of JB Hi-Fi.

For more information please see the Customer Service Desk or call us on 09 925 9211.

KIDDIE KRUZZERS
Looking for the ultimate in kid transportation? Kiddie Kruzzers are available for hire from the Customer Service Desk. Available in single and double seating a Kiddie Kruzzer is the coolest way to get around.

An hourly charge applies - $5 per single, $8 per double - and photo ID is required.

STROLLER HIRE
Shopping with kids? Why not hire a stroller from the Customer Service Desk to make shopping easier. There is no charge, however photo ID is required and terms and conditions apply.

KIDS PLAY AREA
Here at Westfield Albany we have two fantastic Kids Play Areas.

You can find Discovery Island on Level 1 near Stirling Sports and our newest play area can be found on Level 2 outside New World. This lovely new play area is for preschool children under 5 years. As this is a new playground we ask that you remove your shoes and have no food or drink in this area.

All children must be supervised, Westfield does not provide supervision.

Discover all the cool stuff for kids that's happening right here at Westfield! If your little ones are aged 10 or under, they can join the WKids Club and be the first to know what's going on. Plus, they'll get a gift on registration, a card and present from Monty on their birthday, a letter from Santa at Christmas and the chance to win heaps of cool prizes.

Sign up now

A WORLD OF FUN AND GAMES RIGHT AT THEIR LITTLE FINGERTIPS

Monty’s World allows you and your little ones to play with their favourite monkey from any device, anywhere, anytime. It’s packed with games, news about fun-filled events, art and craft ideas and updates on Monty’s monkey business.

Explore Monty’s World now

Here at Westfield Albany we have two fantastic Kids Play Areas.

You can find Discovery Island on Level 1 near Stirling Sports.

Our newest play area can be found on Level 2 outside New World. This lovely new play area is for preschool children under 5 years.

All children must be supervised, Westfield does not provide supervision.

As this is a new playground we ask that you remove your shoes and have no food or drink in this area.

At Westfield we want to make shopping easier for shoppers with babies and young children. Just pull into one of our specially marked Parents with Prams parking spaces located close to the entrances of our centre. On Level 1 there are plenty of specially reserved parking spaces for parents with prams, right outside the entrance to Babycity and Cotton On, and they are undercover for your convenience.

For your convenience we've now got The NewBloom Vending Machines at Westfield Albany. These machines offer parents/caregivers the convenience of nappy/wipe combos (all sizes), organic food pouches and dummies. Convenience at the tip of your fingers.

Looking after our customers and their family is our number one priority. That is why all of our centres have a Customer Service Desk to help you with all your queries. We wish to offer a pleasant and convenient shopping experience.

The Customer Services Desk offer a variety of services including:

- Store Information. To download our Store Centre Directory click here.
- Kiddie Cruiser Hire
- InterCity Bus Tickets
- Mobility Services
- Gift Cards
- General store enquiries.

Should you have any enquires do not hesitate to contact us directly on (09) 978 5300 or email manukau@nz.westfield.com.

Level 1 Centre Management Office, Westfield Tower.
Cnr Great South Rd and Manukau Station Road.
Manukau City, Auckland 2104.
Telephone: (09) 978 5300.

Have a question about Westfield Manukau City?
Feel free to get in touch with the team either by visiting us at the Customer Service Desk (located near Farmers) or by calling us on (09) 978 5300.
You can also drop us an email on manukau@nz.westfield.com. and one of our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

We are available to assist with gift card sales, hire equipment, directions, retailer information, lost property, transport information and more.

$5 for single car - per hour
$8 per double car - per hour
Make sure you also ask about getting your 'Cruiser Licence' where you can get your 10th ride for FREE!
For more information please visit the Customer Service Desk or call us on (09) 978 5310.

stlukes.description:
JUST WHAT THEY’VE ALWAYS WANTED

A Westfield Gift Card is the perfect gift, reward or incentive. Gift Cards are available from the Customer Service Desk and can be loaded with any amount from $10 - $995. The Gift Cards can be used in hundreds of shops in Westfield shopping centres across New Zealand - so there’s something for everybody.

Buy a Westfield Gift Card

PERSONAL STYLING SESSIONS

Have a big event ahead, want to update your look, heading back to work, or just want to find out what works for you?

Personal Styling Sessions provide you with a one-on-one guide to style. In two hours a Westfield Stylist of your choice will assess your shape, style, colouring and budget, then take you to the right stores to try on the right pieces.

After a session you’ll be left with the skills to build the perfect capsule wardrobe and all the personalised advice you’ll need to maintain it – no matter what the season or occasion.

Personal Styling Sessions are available Monday to Sunday during normal shopping hours all year round.

Prices start from $230 for two hours.

Meet the stylists and book your session

GROUP STYLING SESSIONS

Do you and your friends have a big event coming up, want to update your looks for the new season, or find out what works for your individual bodies?

Group Styling Sessions provide an intimate, personalised guide to style for small groups of two to four people.

In two to three hours a Westfield stylist will assess your body shape, style, colouring and budget, then take you to the right stores to try on the right pieces.

After a session you and your friends will be left with the skills to build the perfect capsule wardrobe and all the personalised advice you’ll need to maintain it – no matter what the season or occasion.

Group Styling Sessions are available Monday to Sunday during normal shopping hours all year round.

Prices start from $320 for two hours for two people.

The Westfield St Lukes Creche can take care of your kids while you take care of your shopping. Visit our créche on Level 2 opposite Muffin Break and book your little one in for an hour or two so you can get your shopping done.

ERO TESTIMONIAL

"The 2008 ERO report noted that children were engaged in playing and participated in very good quality programmes that met their different needs. This review finds that high quality practices continue to be evident and children benefit from rich learning opportunities. A caring and inclusive culture is highly apparent. Children enjoy warm, positive relationships with adults and with each other. They are involved in a wide variety of learning experiences, and engage in sustained play. Children have ready access to appropriate equipment and resources, allowing them to make independent choices." Quoted from Education Review Office (ERO) Report, May 2012

Make mall time your time with child care service that allows you to shop, dine, or grab a cup of coffee with a friend, while the kids have safe/secure fun, and the first hour is free! You'll have peace of mind while you enjoy a little "me" time" on us! KidCare is located at Pottery Barn Court.

Ages 3-9
First hour _ Free
Second hour _ $7 per child
Third hour _ $10 per child

The last thing you want to worry about while shopping is your phone. ChargeItSpot is a FREE charging station that can now be found at Westfield, and it will be your life saver. Visit us in the Food Court and in Crate & Barrel Court.

Head to Westfield PlaySpace, and let your little ones have fun while you keep a close eye on the action. Kids can climb and explore the bright, colorful play area filled with animal characters, large puzzles, and plenty of space to stretch those active little legs.

Need to relax, recharge, or just catch your breath? The Family Lounge is a comfortable area where you and your little ones can take a break from shopping. This special spot for families features toys, kid-friendly TV programs, private nursing areas, and baby changing stations.

Locations:

  • Rear of Dining Cafe
  • In Food Court, next to Subway
  • In hallway next to Sports Page

Who's hiring? Check out job postings for Westfield or one of our retail stores, restaurants or specialty shops.

Current employment opportunities »

Loading kids and packages can be challenging, so take advantage of our preferred up-front parking spots. They’re close to entrances and make it easier for expectant mothers and families with small children to visit our center.

If you’re short on shopping cash or need to check your account balance, stop at one of our safe, convenient ATMs at the following locations:

  • Inside entrance to Crate & Barrel Wing next to Macy's
  • Inside entrance near Nordstrom and California Pizza Kitchen
  • Inside Food Court, next to Subway
  • Near the Food Court across from Forever 21
  • Near the Food Court main entrance next to Bow Tie Cinemas

Introducing KidCare - A licensed, drop-off childcare center at Westfield Annapolis.

Bring the children for arts and crafts, movies and play while you shop, dine or catch a movie.

KidCare is located in the Pottery Barn Court. 

  • $5.00 per hour
  • Up to 3 hours
  • For children 3-9 years of age
  • Open during mall hours (may vary for holiday hours)
  • Monthly memberships available

For the most up-to-date events at the center, visit Events.

ABOUT OUR STAFF

All staff hold current First Aid/CPR certification, complete all yearly training requirements (per MD licensing), and must complete a criminal background check before working at KidCare. KidCare is a state-licensed care facility.

Learn more about our KidCare Staff »

PARENT TESTIMONIALS

Discover why so many parents come to us. We have all the credentials you need, such as CPR and First Aid certifications, along with child care training. You child will feel his or her best in our comfortable yet friendly environment.

"We love it. My husband and I get to have a date night for a very reasonable cost" Dawn S.

"My children beg to come here. They love it and I get a break." Rebecca B.

"This is the best idea ever! I can get my shopping done without the little ones tugging at my side!" Kendall B.

"We are visiting from out of town and used this service. It's very convenient. I wish we had one where we live in Florida!" James L.
Misplaced an item during your visit? Please contact for immediate assistance.

Play, shop, eat — find fun events, ideas, and offers for the whole family!

More Details »

We can’t guarantee they’ll eat their vegetables, but kids will love the colorful tables and chairs that are the perfect size for smaller arms and legs.

Located in our Food Court and Dining Cafe.

Visiting Westfield Annapolis with kids in tow? Try a Smarte Carte stroller! Little ones will love riding in these colorful vehicles, and you’ll love keeping them close while you shop.

Smarte Carte strollers feature:

  • Plenty of space for personal items and purchases
  • Two convenient cup holders and a snack tray
  • A moving steering wheel to keep little hands occupied
  • Lap safety belt

Self-serve Smarte Carte strollers are available at the following locations:

  • Inside entrance between Macy's & Maggiano's Little Italy
  • Next to Dining Court escalators
  • Pottery Barn Court, inside the WFamily KidCare corridor

Complimentary wheelchairs and scooters are available for Westfield Annapolis visitors with limited mobility at the Wheelchair/Scooter Kiosk, located next to Bow Tie Cinema ticket booth. Use the kiosk courtesy phone to call Security or, using your cell phone, call, and an officer will be dispatched to assist you. Please present photo ID.

Wheelchairs and scooters are available on a first come, first serve basis.

brandon.description:
Westfield Brandon Donation Policy

During the year, Westfield works to raise awareness and funds for a number of national organizations including St. Jude’s Children’s Hospital, the Make a Wish Foundation, the National MS Society, the American Red Cross, and more.

In addition to national activities, Westfield Brandon receives hundreds of requests each year from worthy organizations throughout our trade area. Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we are unable to grant all of these requests.

There are times however, when Westfield Brandon is able to help. Please read the guidelines below before submitting your request.

Donation Guidelines

Westfield Brandon’s charitable donations are given to non-profit organizations within Brandon’s trade area only. To request a donation, silent auction item, raffle item, or gift cards, please follow these guidelines (no phone, fax, or email requests please):

All requests must be typed on your organization's official letterhead.

Requests must include the following information:

  • Organization's name, 501(c)(3) tax exempt number
  • Copy of the IRS Letter of Determination verifying the organization's tax exempt status
  • Contact name, mailing address, and phone number
  • A brief statement of the organization's mission, goals, accomplishments, governance, and geographical area served
  • Amount of request and how the grant funds will be used
  • The purpose of the event, a time frame for the activities, and a description of who will benefit from the donation

Please mail requests to:

Westfield Brandon
Attn: Marketing Department
459 Brandon Town Center Drive
Brandon, FL 33511

Should we choose to grant your donation request we will contact you.

Occasionally, Westfield Brandon will have opportunities for non-profits to raise funds at the center via special promotions and events. We will keep your organization’s name on file in the event an opportunity should arise that you can participate in.

Thank you for choosing Westfield Brandon. We wish you the best success in your fundraising endeavors.
Follow the link below to view employment opportunities at Westfield Brandon. Employment Opportunities
When items have been misplaced at Westfield Brandon, please contact Westfield Security Team for immediate assistance.

In addition to National & Local Westfield family events, Westfield receives hundreds of requests each year from organizations throughout our trade area looking to hold an event or request access to setup at the Center. In order to fully understand your request and determine availability and needs, we ask that you read and submit requests as described below. No phone, fax or email requests please.

If you’re short on shopping cash or need to check your account balance, stop at one of our safe, convenient ATMs at the following locations:


Inside the Dining Terrace

Adjacent to Yogurtland on Level 1
Center Court
Restaurant Court near Santa Monica Blvd. entrance

Gifts beautifully wrapped at the following locations. Fees may apply.

Bloomingdale's located on Level 3
For a special evening out or last-minute reservation let Westfield Guest Service Ambassadors take care of the details.

PERSONAL SHOPPING

Understanding your designer tastes and lifestyle, personal shopping professionals can fulfill your shopping desires, while saving you precious time.

Whether you want to freshen up your wardrobe with the season's latest styles or find the perfect gift, these expert shopping consultants provide prompt, complimentary service at your convenience.

BLOOMINGDALE'S PERSONAL SHOPPER

For those who want to know about the latest seasonal trends or have limited time to shop, Bloomingdale's offers a complimentary styling and shopping service called Personal Shopper. Stylists can create exciting new wardrobes for women, men, and children; find sensational gifts; and provide personal reminders of special dates.

To schedule an appointment or for more information, please call Bloomingdale's Century City at 310.772.7182.

View store location »

PROFESSIONAL MAKEOVERS

A radiant look for a special occasion. A fresh and flawless appearance for business. Expert makeup artists and beauty advisers can show you the latest trends, innovative products, healthy skin techniques and beauty tips for you to look your best day and night.

BLOOMINGDALE’S

Take a moment for yourself and let the artists at Bloomingdale's show you this season's best in beauty and skin care products. Experience luxury brands, Chanel, Dior, MAC, Tom Ford & Gucci.

View store location »

CARLTON HAIR

Carlton Hair salons are uniquely designed to express the creative individuality of their clients. Their stylists are skilled in the latest techniques in cut and color. Call 310.282.8795 to schedule an appointment.

View store location »

FRESH

Experience signature facials, learn about seasonal makeup trends, discover star products and be the first to preview their newest collections. Call 310.552.0798 for more information or to schedule an appointment.

View store location »

With knowledge of over 100 stores and hundreds of brands, Westfield Guest Service Ambassadors are the ultimate resource to help find the unique gifts people love. Simply call or email centurycity@westfield.com.

Perfect for groups, let the talented Westfield Guest Service Ambassadors assist you in planning a trip to the center. A variety of fun activities and amazing amenities are available to make your visit to Century City truly memorable.

Group Experiences

WESTFIELD GUEST SERVICE AMBASSADORS

When arriving at Westfield Century City, guests are invited to stop by Westfield Guest Services, located on level one near Yogurtland and Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf, to learn about a wide array of services and amenities.

From dining reservations to transportation assistance, gift suggestions to itinerary planning, our highly trained staff is committed to perfecting your experience.

For international guests, Westfield Guest Services offers LanguageLine, an on-demand three-way video interpretation service in over 200 languages, including Mandarin, Cantonese, and regional dialects

How was your visit to our Center?

We’d love to hear from you. Share your Westfield experience.

Perfect for groups, let the talented Westfield Customer Service Ambassadors assist you in planning a trip to the center. A variety of fun activities and amazing amenities are available to make your visit to Century City truly memorable.

For your convenience, handicapped parking is located near the main center entrances. For more information, please contact Westfield Guest Service Ambassadors.

We love our pets and know they are an integral part of your family. We want to make sure they are taken care of while you shop so we’ve expanded our customer amenities to include pet amenities.

  • Doggie treats at Guest Service Ambassadors Desk, near Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf
  • One-Stop Pet Station across from Madewell, featuring three-level water fountains, treats, and waste bags

Visiting us with kids in tow? Try a Smarte Carte stroller! Little ones will love riding in these colorful vehicles, and you’ll love keeping them close while you shop.

Smarte Carte strollers feature:

  • Plenty of space for personal items and purchases
  • Two convenient cup holders and a snack tray
  • A moving steering wheel to keep little hands occupied
  • Lap safety belt

Self-serve single strollers are available at the following locations:

  • Next to Macy's near the Red parking entrance
  • Near Valet parking in front of Gelson's

Smarte Carte self-serve stroller vending units accept credit cards or cash.
For your convenience a USPS service counter is located near Fresh on the west side of the center.

Westfield Century City has two luxury valet locations:

  • Enter off Santa Monica Blvd. on the north side of the center
  • Enter off Century Park West on the south side of the center

VALET RATES

  • 0-2 Hours: $8.00
  • Every 30 mins thereafter: $2.00
  • 6+ Hours: $28.00

VALET VALIDATION

  • Spend $750 or more in one day and receive a complimentary valet validation at the Guest Services Desk located on level 1 near Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf. 

GELSON'S VALET VALIDATION

  • 0-3 Hours: Free with minimum purchase of $25.00
  • Minimum charge after 3 Hours: $14.00
  • Every 30 mins thereafter: $2.00
  • 6+ Hours: $28.00

HANDICAP ACCESSIBLE VEHICLES

  • Flat Rate: $8.00

All of the above rates include a 10% City of Los Angeles parking tax. For more information, please call the parking office.

Need to relax, recharge, or just catch your breath? The exclusive Westfield Family Lounge includes: private nursing areas, baby changing-stations, bottle warmers, child-friendly bathrooms and a comfortable rest area with safe toys and televisions airing children's programming.

The Westfield Family Lounge is located inside the Dining Terrace.

For Whatever They Want

Give the gift of ultimate choice, the Westfield Gift card by American Express. The beautifully packaged cards may be used virtually everywhere in the U.S. that accepts American Express Cards. From $20 - $500, the Westfield Gift Card is the right choice for any occasion. Westfield Gift Cards may be purchased at any Westfield Shopping Center. In addition, gift cards in pre-denominated amounts of $25, $50, $100 and $200 may be purchased online.

The Westfield Gift Card has no monthly fees, no lost value and no expiration of funds making them truly 100% gift!

Card purchase charge of $3.00 applies to each gift card purchased.

Gift of Confidence Westfield Gift Cards are honored and guaranteed by American Express. Give the gift of confidence knowing that our gift cards are backed by 150 years of service and acceptance.

Gift of Choice Westfield Gift Cards are “open loop” which means they may be used virtually anywhere within a Westfield Shopping Center. Our gift cards may also be used outside of Westfield at millions of merchants nationwide that accept the American Express card.

To purchase Westfield Gift Cards in person at Westfield Century City, please visit the Guest Services Desk during hours of operation.

Online Sales: Your gift card purchase is just a click away. Complete all your gift card shopping from the comfort of your home or office.

Buy Online Now.

Family time should be spent together. That’s why we’ve built a wonderland for kids to play in - one which will put the stars in their eyes, just as a new pair of shoes or a shiny laptop does in yours. Our safe PlaySpace is filled with climbing structures, animal characters, and plenty of space to stretch out little legs. Now when you play, they can too.

EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES
Misplaced an item during your visit? Please contact Westfield Security Team for immediate assistance.

Westfield Citrus Park Donation Policy

During the year, Westfield works to raise awareness and funds for a number of national organizations including St. Jude’s Children’s Hospital, Make a Wish Foundation, the National MS Society, American Red Cross and more.

In addition to national activities, Westfield Citrus Park receives hundreds of requests each year from worthy organizations throughout our trade area. Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we are unable to grant all of these requests.

There are times however, when Westfield Citrus Park is able to help. Please read the guidelines below before submitting your request.

Donation Guidelines

Westfield Citrus Park’s charitable donations are given to non-profit organizations within Citrus Park’s trade area only. To request a donation, silent auction item, raffle item or gift cards, please follow these guidelines (no phone, fax, or email requests please):

All requests must be typed on your organization's official letterhead

Requests must include the following information:

  • Organization's name, 501(c)(3) tax exempt number
  • Copy of the IRS Letter of Determination verifying the organization's tax exempt status
  • Contact name, mailing address, and phone number
  • A brief statement of the organization's mission, goals, accomplishments, governance, and geographical area served
  • Amount of request and how the grant funds will be used
  • The purpose of the event, a time frame for the activities, and a description of who will benefit from the donation

 Please mail requests to:

Westfield Citrus Park
Attn: Marketing Department
8021 Citrus Park Drive
Tampa, FL 33625

Should we choose to grant your donation request we will contact you.

Occasionally, Westfield Citrus Park will have opportunities for non-profits to raise funds at the center via special promotions and events. We will keep your organization’s name on file in the event an opportunity should arise that you can participate in.

Thank you for choosing Westfield Citrus Park. We wish you the best success in your fundraising endeavors.

Velochi(SM) Tablet Strollers by Smarte Carte

Westfield Citrus Park is excited to introduce the new Velochi(SM) Tablet Strollers by Smarte Carte!  The Velochi stroller combines sleek, attractive style with functionality and tablet entertainment for children to enhance your shopping experiences and they are only $8.00 for the whole day. 

Key features of Velochi strollers:

  • Sleek, modern design that fits with the aesthetic of your centers
  • Embedded tablets with apps and games for children – one tablet in the “single” model and two tablets in the “double” model.
  • A parcel tray for parent’s packages.
  • “Antler” handles to hang packages and for taller parents to push the stroller.
  • Comfortable hammock style seating for children.
  • Cup holders to handle any size drink, including juice boxes.
  • Soft, easy-roll wheels to provide a smooth ride with easy turning and maneuverability.

Self-serve strollers are available at the following locations:

  • Center Court, near Starbucks
  • Food Court

Play, shop, eat -- find fun events, ideas and offers for the whole family!

More Details »

Need to relax, recharge, or just catch your breath? The Family Lounge is a comfortable area where you and your little ones can take a break from shopping. This special spot for families features toys, kid-friendly TV programs, private nursing areas, and baby changing stations.

The Family Lounge is located in the Food Court.

Are you ordering dinner out tonight?

Westfield Citrus Park is pleased to offer a convenient and easy way to pick up your to go dinner from BJ’s Restaurant & Brewhouse, Grimaldi’s Coal Brick-Oven Pizzeria and Red Robin Gourmet Burgers.

Call in, pick up, and take home.

Westfield Family Parking is located at the Food Court Entrance, the Main Entrance off Citrus Park Drive (near BJ's Restaurant & Brewhouse and Red Robin Gourmet Burgers) and inside the First Level of the Parking Garage.

Westfield Garden State Plaza is excited to partner with Candace Kristin Personal Styling to offer individual styling and group shopping parties. This new service will help you navigate how to style yourself and find the perfect wardrobe for your lifestyle. Whether it's a night out or an entire wardrobe, Candace can make you look your best.

Candace Arslanian Rosenberg began her career in fashion as Fashion Director of Publishing at Child magazine where she co-created and produced the first-ever children’s fashion show under the tents at New York Fashion Week. She traveled to Europe for trend reporting and learned about the industry from the inside. Later at Allure magazine, she continued her involvement with fashion shows. These years of experience helped Candace realize that the fashion industry thrives on promoting trends rather than personal style, which contradicted her own philosophy.

Her belief that style is about enhancing and expressing one’s inner and outer self, not about achieving a look dictated by fashion media, drove her to pursue a career in personal styling. As the longtime “go-to” resource for friends and acquaintances seeking fashion advice and the recipient of numerous “Best Dressed” awards in community publications, the transition was a natural fit. Through personal styling, Candace strives to empower women to look and feel like the best version of themselves. The process is as rewarding for her as it is for her clients.

Call for more information or to schedule a consultation.

Visiting us with kids in tow? Now try the new Velochi stroller which combines sleek, attractive style with functionality and tablet entertainment for children.

Key features of Velochi strollers:

  • Sleek, modern design that fits with the aesthetic of your centers
  • Embedded tablets with apps and games for children
  • One tablet in the “single” model and two tablets in the “double” model.
  • A parcel tray for parent’s packages. 
  • “Antler” handles to hang packages and for taller parents to push the stroller.
  • Comfortable hammock style seating for children.
  • Cup holders to handle any size drink, including juice boxes.
  • Soft, easy-roll wheels to provide a smooth ride with easy turning and maneuverability.

The tablets are pre-loaded with content. A mix of games, puzzles, and videos appropriate for children ages 18 months to 6 years is on each tablet. The content is locked down with security software and the tablets are not able to surf the internet. Each single stroller has one tablet; each double stroller has two tablets.

Stroller Rental Pricing:

  • Single stroller with the tablet is $8.00.
  • Double stroller with the tablet is $10.00.

Self-serve strollers are available at the following locations:

  • Double Strollers: Entrance #3 by Shake Shack
  • Single Strollers: Near the bathrooms next to Sidney Thomas

meriden.description:
Need to relax, recharge, or just catch your breath? The Family Lounge is a comfortable area where you and your little ones can take a break from shopping.

This special spot for families features toys, kid-friendly TV programs, private nursing areas, and baby changing stations.

The Family Lounge is located on the Upper Level in the Best Buy Wing. Family Restrooms are also located on the Upper Level in the Food Court.

Head to Westfield PlaySpace and let your little ones have fun while you keep a close eye on the action. Kids can climb and explore the bright, colorful play area filled with animal characters, large puzzles, and plenty of space to stretch those active little legs.

Children in Westfield PlaySpace must to be supervised by an adult at all times.

PlaySpace is located on the Upper Level, near Best Buy.

Listing of participating restaurants and eateries here »

En Westfield Plaza Bonita, encontrará JCPenney, Target, Nordstrom Rack y Macy's. Además tenemos tiendas de especialidades, incluyendo Aeropostale, American Eagle Outfitters, Bath & Body Works, Disney Store, Children's Place, Gymboree, Hollister, LensCrafters, Payless Shoesource, Skechers, Victoria's Secret, XXI y TOUS Presione aquí. para obtener una lista completa de las tiendas.

Nuestros restaurantes incluyen Applebee's, El Torito, Panda Express, Sbarro, Outback Steakhouse y Red Robin. Presione aquí para obtener una lista completa de los restaurantes.

Para sus hijos pequeños, Westfield Plaza Bonita tiene un Salón Familiar con lugares privados para alimentar al bebe y cambiadores para bebé, ubicado cerca del area de comida y Cathy Jean. Ofrecemos carritos de renta para niños, Smarte Carte, ubicados cerca de Applebee’s y Macy's.

Las familias con niños pequeños pueden estacionarse en los espacios nombrados Family Parking, ubicados dentro de la estructura de estacionamiento, en la entrada del area de comida. Además tenemos un espacio de Juegos para niños, ubicado cerca de Macy’s.

Si tiene alguna pregunta o si le podemos prestar nuestra ayuda antes de su visita, llame al (619) 267-2850 o envíenos un correo electrónico a plazabonita@westfield.com.

Shopping with children isn't always easy...

Westfield Plaza Bonita offers Smarte Carte® strollers to make shopping with your children easy and fun.

The colorful vehicle-themed strollers help keep children happy, comfortable and safe while adults shop. Choose from the race car-themed single stroller, or fire truck-themed double stroller.

Smarte Carte self-serve stroller vending units accept credit cards or cash.

The strollers feature:

  • Plenty of space for personal items and purchases
  • Two convenient cup holders and a snack tray
  • A moving steering wheel to keep little hands occupied
  • Lap safety belt

You'll find a self-service Smarte Carte located here:

  • Applebee's Entrance, Level 1
  • Macy’s Entrance, Level 2

Complimentary wheelchairs are available at the Security office, located on level 2 behind the restrooms and Family Lounge.

Wheelchairs are subject to availability. To utilize the service, a photo ID is required.

Not sure where a store is located? Need help finding the restrooms? Need assistance with an elevator? Introducing Answers on the Spot, new service provided by Westfield San Francisco Centre.

Text with your Centre questions and get an instant response from Guest Service Ambassadors.

ATMS
Please find ATMs at the following Westfield San Francisco Centre locations:

  • Level C Concourse near CAFÉ BELLINI.
  • Level 1 near L’OCCITANE EN PROVENCE.
  • Level 3 near H&M.

CURRENCY EXCHANGE
Currency Exchange International specialize in foreign currency exchange. They buy and sell 80+ currencies, exchange US and foreign Traveler's Checks, and hold currency in stock daily. Currency Exchange International offers exchange rates that are better than local banks and much better than the airport exchange rates. No foreign coins exchanged. Located on Level 1 near Nordstrom

Bespoke is a trifecta of coworking, demo, and event spaces strategically located at Westfield San Francisco in the epicenter of downtown, where tech and retail marketplaces converge. For more information click here.

sanfrancisco.description: For a special evening out or last-minute reservation let Westfield Guest Services take care of the details. Westfield Guest Services is located next to Michael Kors on Level 1.

Join the world-class team of Westfield or one of Westfield San Francisco Centre's department stores, restaurants or specialty shops.

View employment opportunities here.

The last thing you will have to worry about while shopping is your phone. ChargeItSpot is a free charging station that can be found now at Westfield and it will be your life saver. Visit us on the level 4 near M.Y China.

Surf while you shop at Westfield with our free Wi-Fi service. Wherever you are at Westfield San Francisco Centre, you have the freedom to connect to the internet via "Free Westfield Wi-Fi". To take advantage of our super-fast service, simply access the internet from your laptop or phone as normal and follow the on-screen prompts. All services subject to availability. Terms and conditions apply.
With the knowledge of over 200 stores and hundreds of brands, Westfield Guest Services are the ultimate resource to help find the unique gifts people love.

When arriving at Westfield San Francisco Centre, guests are invited to stop by Westfield Guest Services, located next to Michael Kors on Level 1 to learn about a wide array of services and amenities.

From dinner reservations to transportation assistance, gift suggestions to itinerary planning, our highly trained staff is committed to perfecting your experience.

For international guests, Westfield Guest Services offers LanguageLine, an on-demand three-way video interpretation service in over 200 languages, including Mandarin, Cantonese, and regional dialects.

In partnership with Happy Returns, Westfield San Francisco Centre Guest Services makes it easy to return online purchases while visiting the Centre! 

Simply bring qualifying online purchases from Happy Returns' participating retailers to the Guest Service desk, and the Guest Service Ambassador will process the return for you and initiate your refund immediately—with no packing or shipping required—all at no cost to you!
Connect to a live interpreter in over 200 languages. Please visit Guest Services located on Level 1 for Language Assistance.

Whether you are visiting by car, train, bus or taxi, Westfield Guest Services are available to assist you with transportation needs. Facilitation of car or limo service from your hotel, home or office is also available.
When items have been misplaced at Westfield San Francisco Centre, please contact Westfield Guest Services for immediate assistance, located on Level 1.

YOU LIKE TO LOOK GOOD: STYLEKOUNCIL SHOPPING PACKAGES

VIP STYLE SELECT Shop for high style with priceless advice. Minimum 3 hours/$160 per hour.

RED CARPET CHIC Create a tailored look for that special occasion. Minimum 3 hours/$150 per hour.

FIX UP, LOOK SHARP Upgrade your everyday style.

Minimum 2 hours/$130 per hour.

THE GRAND TOUR Share your session with friends. Minimum 3 hours. Price depends on the size of group.

For more information please contact Westfield Guest Services at sanfrancisco@westfield.com.

Security

Here at Westfield San Francisco Centre, safety is of paramount importance. We believe in a “See Something, Say Something” policy.  For medical emergencies, please dial 9-1-1. For non-emergencies or if you wish to report suspicious activity, please contact Westfield Security. For general centre inquiries, please contact the Westfield Management Office.

Westfield Security

Mezzanine Level (entrance on Level 1 near elevators and Chase ATM)

Whether you are visiting by car, train, bus or taxi, Westfield Guest Services are available to assist you with transportation needs. Facilitation of car from your hotel, home or office is also available.

HOURS OF OPERATION

Mon-Sat 10:00AM – 10:00PM Sun 10:00AM – 8:00PM

WITH VALIDATION FROM NORDSTROM

First 30 Minutes $5.00 (or fraction thereof). Each Additional 20 Minutes $3.00 (or fraction thereof). Daily Maximum $25.00 (up to 12 hours).

FROM THE RESTAURANT COLLECTION UNDER THE DOME

To receive the Restaurant Collection Under the Dome valet rate, dinners must receive validation from the restaurants.

Please note this Restaurant Collection Validation rate is for CUSTOMERS ONLY – no employees. Abusing this policy may forfeit rights provided by valet operator.

M.Y.China, Tap(415): First 3 Hours $10.00 (or fraction thereof). Each Additional 20 Minutes $3.50 (or fraction thereof). Daily Maximum $30.00 (up to 12 hours).

WITHOUT VALIDATION

First 20 Minutes $6.00 (or fraction thereof). Each Additional 20 Minutes $3.50 (or fraction thereof). Daily Maximum $30.00 (up to 12 hours).

Lost tickets must pay daily maximum rate.

Credit cards accepted.

Please do not leave vehicle unattended. Driver must leave keys with attendant. Valet drop off is located on Fifth Street.

Need to relax, recharge, or just catch your breath? The Family Lounge is a comfortable area where you and your little ones can take a break from shopping. This special spot for families features toys, kid-friendly TV programs, nursing areas, and baby changing stations.

Conveniently located on the Concourse Level near the Food Emporium.

For Whatever They Want

Give the gift of ultimate choice, the Westfield Gift card by American Express. The beautifully packaged cards may be used virtually everywhere in the U.S. that accepts American Express Cards. From $20 - $500, the Westfield Gift Card is the right choice for any occasion. Westfield Gift Cards may be purchased at any Westfield Shopping Center. In addition, gift cards in pre-denominated amounts of $25, $50, $100 and $200 may be purchased online.

The Westfield Gift Card has no monthly fees, no lost value and no expiration of funds making them truly 100% gift!

Card purchase charge of $3.00 applies to each gift card purchased.

Gift of Confidence Westfield Gift Cards are honored and guaranteed by American Express. Give the gift of confidence knowing that our gift cards are backed by 150 years of service and acceptance.

Gift of Choice Westfield Gift Cards are “open loop” which means they may be used virtually anywhere within a Westfield Shopping Center. Our gift cards may also be used outside of Westfield at millions of merchants nationwide that accept the American Express card.

Westfield Shopping Center Sales Westfield Gift Cards are sold at all 55 of our shopping centers. Stop by the Westfield Management Office.

*Please note: Management Office Hours are Monday - Friday, 8:30am - 5:30pm. (Saturday and Sunday Closed)

Online Sales Your gift card purchase is just a click away. Complete all your gift card shopping from the comfort of your home or office.

Buy Online Now.

santaanita.description:
VALET AND AUTO SPA

At Westfield Santa Anita, enjoy the ease and convenience of both professional valet service and car wash service. You'll find these amenities at Restaurant Square, and on the first level of The Promenade garage near Nordstrom.

VALET AND AUTO SPA OPERATING HOURS

RESTAURANT SQUARE

  • Mon - Thu: 11:00 am - 8:00 pm
  • Fri - Sat: 11:00 am - 1:00 am
  • Sun: 12:00 - 8:00 pm

PROMENADE GARAGE

  • Fri - Sat: 1:00 - 8:00 pm
  • Sun: 1:00 - 7:00 pm

VALET RATES

  • Mon - Thu: $6
  • Fri - Sun: $8

AUTO SPA RATES

Basic Wash: $19.99 - $24.99 (includes complimentary valet)

  • Exterior hand wash
  • Vacuum
  • Dash cleaning
  • Tire dressings
  • Choice of air freshener

Deluxe Wash: $34.99 - $39.99 (includes complimentary valet)

  • Exterior hand wash
  • Spray wax
  • Vacuum
  • Interior cleaning
  • Tire dressings
  • Choice of air freshener

The Works: $64.99 - $74.99 (includes complimentary valet)

  • Exterior hand wash
  • Hand wax
  • Vacuum
  • Interior cleaning
  • Upholstery cleaning
  • Tire dressings
  • Choice of air feshener

Ultimate: $159.99 - $174.99 (includes complimentary valet)

  • Exterior hand wash
  • Hand wax
  • Clay wax
  • Vacuum
  • Carpet shampoo
  • Interior cleaning
  • Upholstery cleaning
  • Tire dressings
  • Choice of air freshener

INTERIOR

Westfield Santa Anita welcomes owners and their pets. While shopping indoors, please have dogs in bags or strollers with the exception of service animals.

EXTERIOR (THE PROMENADE)

On The Promenade, all dogs must be on a leash. Dogs may not be on the grass.

RULES FOR INTERIOR & EXTERIOR AREAS

  • No dogs are allowed on property without accompaniment of an adult.
  • Owners are responsible for picking up after their dog, and will be cited if this does not occur.
  • Dogs must not impede mall entrances & store entrances.
  • Dogs will be removed from property if they are a nuisance of any kind — including, but not limited to barking, biting, or other disruptive behavior.
  • Owners must curb their animals.
  • Owners shall bear the responsibility of their dog's actions while on property

Have to get a gift but don't know their size or favorite color? Need to pick up a present but don't have time to shop? Westfield Gift Cards by American Express are the perfect solution. The card may be used virtually anywhere in the U.S. where American Express is accepted, and they're easily purchased at the Management Office Monday through Friday from 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM.  The Management Office is located on Level 2 across from The Gap and Gap Kids.

Buy Online Now.

Check gift card balance or transaction history at American Express.

santaanita.description:
Need to relax, recharge, or just catch your breath? The Family Lounge is a comfortable area where you and your little ones can take a break from shopping. This special spot for families features toys, kid-friendly TV programs, private nursing areas, and baby changing stations.
</br>
The Family Lounge is located in the Food Court and in The Promenade.

Head to Westfield PlaySpace, and let your little ones have fun while you keep a close eye on the action. Kids can climb and explore the bright, colorful play area filled with animal characters, large puzzles, and plenty of space to stretch those active little legs.

Children in Westfield PlaySpace must to be supervised by an adult at all times.

We have two PlaySpaces available: The indoor PlaySpace is located on Level 1 by JCPenney, and the outdoor PlaySpace is located on The Promenade by Macy's.

Hours of Operation:

Monday to Saturday 10: 00 AM - 9:00 PM

Sunday 11:00 AM - 7:00 PM

Complimentary wheelchairs are available for our visitors with limited mobility. Please contact Westfield Security Office, present a photo ID, and we’ll be happy to help.

The wheelchairs are subject to availability and are first-come, first-serve.

All Electric Vehicle drivers can now charge their cars while they are shopping, dining or going to the movies.  Come check out the charging stations on the first floor of the Promenade Garage.  Connect to the world's largest EV charging network. Must have ChargePoint account before using.  Stations have a tiered pricing structure, see app for details.

Loading kids and packages can be challenging, so take advantage of our preferred up-front parking spots. They’re close to entrances, and make it easier for expectant mothers and families with small children to visit our center. Westfield Santa Anita family parking is located:

  • In the parking lot next to JC Penney/ Nordstrom
  • By valet and Cheesecake Factory
  • Outside the parking garage
  • Inside the promenade garage by Nordstrom and Macy's

Visiting us with kids in tow? Try a Smarte Carte stroller! Little ones will love riding in these colorful vehicles, and you'll love keeping them close while you shop.

Smarte Carte strollers feature:

  • Plenty of space for personal items and purchases
  • Two convenient cup holders and a snack tray
  • A moving steering wheel to keep little hands occupied
  • Lap safety belt

Self-serve strollers are available at the following locations:

  • Upper Level H&M (single strollers)
  • Lower Level Johnny Rockets (single strollers)
  • Lower Level Macy's (double-strollers)
Misplaced an item during your visit? Please contact the Westfield Security Team for immediate assistance.

Who’s hiring? Check out job postings for Westfield or one of our retail stores, restaurants or specialty shops.

Search for jobs

Westfield Santa Anita provides ATMs located conveniently throughout the center. Please find them at the following locations:

  • Bank of America: Food Court
  • Wells Fargo: Food Court
  • National Link: Across from Diamond Wireless, near the Food Court

Visiting us with kids in tow? Try a Smarte Carte stroller! Little ones will love riding in these colorful vehicles, and you’ll love keeping them close while you shop.

Smarte Carte strollers feature:

  • Plenty of space for personal items and purchases
  • Two convenient cup holders and a snack tray
  • A moving steering wheel to keep little hands occupied
  • Lap safety belt

Self-serve strollers are available at the following location:

  • Just inside the northeast wing by Talbots

We’re parents too. We know what shopping with little ones can be like, so we’re happy to provide family-friendly services for you and your kids.

  • Family Parking: located at the entrance near Gymboree
  • Smarte Carte Strollers: fun for the kids, convenient for you
  • Baby Changing Table: located in the women's restroom
  • Restroom Lounge: a space to relax and recharge - plasma TV, sitting area for all ages

CURRENCY EXCHANGE

Currency Exchange International specialize in foreign currency exchange. They buy and sell 80+ currencies, exchange US and foreign Traveler's Checks, and hold currency in stock daily. Currency Exchange International offers exchange rates that are better than local banks and much better than the airport exchange rates. No foreign coins exchanged.  Located in Talbot's court.
Misplaced an item during your visit? Please contact the Westfield Security Team for immediate assistance.
Complimentary wheelchairs are available at the Security Office for our visitors with limited mobility. Just present a photo ID and we’ll be happy to help. The wheelchairs are subject to availability.

Who’s hiring? Visit center retailers to see who is hiring, or stop in the mall office for a list.  The mall office is located at the end of the restroom hallway, just past the Security Office.  

See who is now hiring >>

southshore.description: Misplaced an item during your visit? Please contact the Westfield Security Team for immediate assistance.

Bienvenidos al sitio web de Westfield South Shore, ubicado en 1701 Sunrise Highway en Bayshore, New York. Nuestro centro de compras es facilmente alcansado por el camino Highway 27.

En Westfield South Shore, encontrará JC Penney, Lord and Taylor, Macy's y Sears. Además tenemos tiendas de especialidades, incluyendo Aeropostale, American Eagle, Champs, Disney Store, Forever 21, Gap, Journeys, Kay Jewelers, Payless, Victoria's Secret, Zales Jewelers y Zumiez. Presione aquí para obtener una lista completa de las tiendas.

Nuestros restaurantes incluyen Boulder Creek Steakhouse, IHOP, McDonalds, Old Country Buffet, Pollo Loco, Subway y TGI Friday's. Presione aquí para obtener una lista completa de los restaurantes en Westfield South Shore.

A continuación, se indica el horario del centro de compras Westfield South Shore. Observe los horarios de las tiendas de departamento, restaurantes y cines porque pueden variar.

  • Lunes a Sábado: 10:00 am a 9:30 pm
  • Domingo: 11:00 am a 6:00 pm

Para sus hijos pequeños, Westfield South Shore tiene un Salón Familiar con lugares privados para alimentar al bebe y cambiadores para bebés, ubicado cerca de Lord and Taylor. Ofrecemos carritos de renta para niños, Smarte Carte, ubicado cerca de JC Penney.

Las mujeres embarazadas y las familias con niños pequeños pueden estacionarse en los espacios cercanos a entradas designados especialmente para ellos. Además tenemos un Espacio de Juegos para niños, ubicado cerca de Sears.

Nuestro equipo del Personal de Asistencia de Westfield ubicado cerca de Lord and Taylor brinda un servicio cordial e informativo durante su visita al Westfield South Shore. Nuestros empleados de asistencia hablan espanol. Los servicios de Asistencia están disponibles los dias.

  • Viernes: 4:00 a 9:00 pm
  • Sábado: 12:00 a 9:00 pm
  • Domingo: 12:00 a 6:00 pm

Si tiene alguna pregunta o si le podemos prestar nuestra ayuda antes de su visita, llame o envíenos un correo electrónico a southshore@westfield.com.

Need to relax, recharge, or just catch your breath? The Family Lounge is a comfortable area where you and your little ones can take a break from shopping. This special spot for families features toys, kid-friendly TV programs, private nursing areas, and baby changing stations.

Head to Westfield PlaySpace, and let your little ones have fun while you keep a close eye on the action. Kids can climb and explore the bright, colorful play area filled with animal characters, large puzzles, and plenty of space to stretch those active little legs.

The PlaySpace is located in front of rue21.

We can’t guarantee they’ll eat their vegetables, but kids will love the colorful tables and chairs that are the perfect size for smaller arms and legs.

Children's tables and chairs are located in the Dining Court near the fish tank.

Play, shop, eat — find fun events, ideas and offers for the whole family!

More Details »

The card may be used virtually anywhere in the U.S. where American Express is accepted, and they're easily purchased at the Management Office.

Buy Online Now.

topanga.description:
Not sure where a store is located? Need a restaurant suggestion?
Introducing Answers on the Spot, a service provided by Westfield Topanga & The Village.
Text the number 818.306.5956 with your center question and get an instant response from Westfield Topanga & The Village.

If you’re short on shopping cash, or need to check your account balance, stop at one of our convenient ATMs at the following locations:

Westfield Topanga

  • Level 1, near Blaze Pizza
  • Level 1, near Nordstrom (Bank of America)
  • Level 1, Dining Terrace

The Village

  • Wells Fargo Bank, facing Topanga Canyon Blvd.

The Westfield Topanga Community Center is located at the northeast corner of Westfield Topanga, at the Vanowen Street and Owensmouth Avenue intersection. Please contact the Westfield Topanga Management Office for rates and availability, 818.227.5500.

Features:

  • 7,000 square feet
  • Maximum capacity of 300 persons
  • Wi-Fi
  • Private conference room with TV and seating for up to 18 persons
  • Back-of-house catering space and prep area
  • Kitchenette with double-door refrigerator and small sink
  • Handicap accessible restrooms and parking spaces

Here is a list of restaurants that cater at Westfield Topanga and The Village.
For a special evening out or last-minute reservation at one of our many restaurants, please text Westfield Topanga & The Village Guest Services at 818.306.5956.
With knowledge of over 300 stores and hundreds of brands, Westfield is the ultimate resource to help find that unique gift they will love. Simply text Guest Services at 818-306-5956 for suggestions.

Whether you dash in for a quick stop, or stay for an entire day of shopping, all our guests are important to us. Westfield Guest Service Ambassadors want you to have the best experience possible, so we’re here to help. We can direct you to a specific store, make dinner reservations, find local services, and much more. Please stop by and say "hello," and let us know if there’s anything we can do for you.

At Westfield Topanga, Guest Services is located on Level One near California Pizza Kitchen.

At The Village, Guest Services is located on Level One in the middle of the center, directly across from Veggie Grill and Wokcano. 

Guest Service hours at Westfield Topanga are Mon-Sat 11am-9pm & Sun 11am-7pm. Guest Service hours at The Village are Mon-Thurs 10am-9pm, Fri-Sat 10am-10pm & Sun 10am-8pm. 

For more information please call 818.227.5514 for Westfield Topanga Guest Services & 818.836.8586 for The Village Guest Services. 

You may also text Guest Services at 818.306.5956.

Complimentary manual wheelchairs are available for our visitors at Westfield Topanga & The Village with limited mobility, based on availability.


At Westfield Topanga please visit or contact the Westfield Security Operations Center, Level 1 near Islands Restaurant to inquire about available wheelchairs. To inquire about a wheelchair at The Village, please call Security at 818.594.8734 or visit Guest Services near the Clock Tower and Veggie Grill and we’ll be happy to help.

A collateral card is required such as a Costco Card, AAA Card or Library Card. For your convenience, handicapped parking is located near the main entrances at Westfield Topanga & The Village. For more information, please contact the Westfield Security Operations Center at 818.594.8734.

Visiting us with little kids in tow? Try a Velochi by Smarte Carte stroller! Little ones will love riding in these colorful vehicles, and you’ll love keeping them close while you shop.

Key features of Velochi strollers:

  • Sleek, modern design that fits with the aesthetic of your centers.
  • Steering wheels that hold a cell phone – one steering wheel in the “single” model and two steering wheels in the “double” model.
  • A parcel tray for parent’s packages.
  • “Antler” handles to hang packages and for taller parents to push the stroller.
  • Comfortable hammock style seating for children.
  • Cup holders to handle any size drink, including juice boxes.
  • Soft, easy-roll wheels to provide a smooth ride with easy turning and maneuverability.

The steering wheels can hold a cell phone – Your child may enjoy “driving” the Velochi with the steering wheel, but we’ve also provided a convenient space to safely rest your cell phone on and let your child play games or watch videos while you shop. Each single stroller has one steering wheel; each double stroller has two steering wheels.

Self-serve strollers are available at the following locations inside Westfield Topanga:

  • Upper Level by Target (singles)
  • Upper Level by Nordstrom (singles)
  • Lower Level by Target (doubles)

Cost:

  • The rental price for the single Velochi is $6.00.
  • The rental price for the double stroller is $8.00.

50¢ deposit returned when returned to the track location.

Whether you are visiting by car, train, bus or taxi, the Westfield Topanga & The Village team is happy to assist. Facilitation of car or limo service from your hotel, home, or office is also available. Please call 818.594.8732, email Topanga@westfield.com, or text 818.306.5956.

Take advantage of our best exchange rates while you choose from over 75 currencies, available now for your next trip. The Travelex kiosk is located inside Westfield Topanga on Level 1 in front of Anthropologie. You may also contact Travelex at 818.340.2500.

All aboard the Westfield Topanga Trolley! The Trolley runs daily between Westfield Topanga and The Village, with a daily, weekday stop at Warner Center from 11am-2pm (Monday-Friday, only). This convenient amenity makes it easy and fun to Shop, Dine, and Explore both properties.

Trolley Schedule:

Monday-Saturday: 11am-10pm

**The trolley is 'out to lunch' Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday from 2:30pm-3pm

Sunday: 11am-8pm

  • Westfield Topanga: The Trolley pick-up/drop-off location is outside of The Cheesecake Factory. The Trolley picks-up/drops-off approximately every 20 minutes.
  • The Village: The Trolley pick-up/drop-off location is inside The Village parking garage on Level 1, in the Grand Lobby near Le Pain Quotidien. The Trolley picks-up/drops-off approximately every 20 minutes.
  • Warner Center: The Trolley pick-up/drop-off location is 21650 Oxnard Street - At Warner Center Towers, East of Owensmouth Avenue on the South side (Corner of Oxnard Street & Owensmouth Ave). The Trolley picks-up/drops-off at this location Monday-Friday, only, from 11am-2pm. The Trolley picks-up/drops-off approximately every 20 minutes.

Text Guest Services at 818.306.5956 to get Trolley ETA to the Trolley stop you are waiting at (please specify which Trolley stop you are waiting at).

Professional valet service is available at six stations. All locations and will pick-up/drop-off at any of the given locations – simply use our ‘Text N’ Go’ service via the number 606.776.0331!

Westfield Topanga

  • Enter off Topanga Canyon Blvd. in front of Neiman Marcus, $7
  • Enter off Topanga Canyon Blvd. in front of The Cheesecake Factory, $10
  • Enter off Victory Blvd. in front of Nordstrom, $10
  • Enter off Owensmouth Ave. at the ground level of the parking deck, $10

Go Green Professional Car Wash and Detail Service is located on the ground level of the Owensmouth Parking Deck, directly off of Owensmouth Ave.

The Village

  • Northside between Victory and Topanga Canyon Blvd., near Il Fornaio Cucina Italiana, $10
  • South side between Erwin St. and Topanga Canyon Blvd., near Eureka!, $10

Professional valet service at The Village is sponsored by the All New Lexus of Woodland Hills. Visit their vehicle displays at the two valet locations on Topanga Canyon Blvd., or on your way to Center Court.

Need to relax, recharge, or just catch your breath? The Family Lounge is a comfortable area where you and your little ones can take a break from shopping. This special spot for families features toys, kid-friendly TV programs, private nursing areas, and baby changing stations.

Family Lounge Locations:

  • Westfield Topanga: Upper Level Dining Terrace and Lower Level Target Court
  • The Village: Near The Grand Lobby behind Veggie Grill

Have to get a gift, but don't know their size or favorite color? Need to pick up a present but don't have time to shop? Westfield Gift Cards by American Express are the perfect solution.

The card may be used virtually anywhere in the U.S. where American Express is accepted, and they're easily purchased at Guest Services.

Inside Westfield Topanga, Guest Services is located on Level 1 near CPK and Gucci, at the base of the spiral staircase, and is open 7 days a week.

At The Village, Guest Services is located near the Clock Tower and Wokcano Restaurant, and is open Thursday-Sunday from 11am-8pm.

Buy Online Now.

topanga.description:
Head to one of our two Westfield PlaySpaces, and let your little ones have fun while you keep a close eye on the action.

At Westfield Topanga, located on Level 1 near Target, kids can climb and explore the bright, colorful play area filled with animal characters, large puzzles, and plenty of space to stretch those active little legs.

At the Village, located near 24 Hour Fitness, the Kids Climber is a whimsical, exciting climbing structure designed for children. The Village PlaySpace, which looks more like a sculpture than a traditional playground, complements the natural surroundings and overall aesthetic of the Village and is sponsored by UCLA Health.
topanga.long_title: Westfield PlaySpaces sponsored by UCLA Health

topanga.description:
Visiting The Village on your bike? We have a few complimentary amenities for you!

  • Bike Lockers: Located at the South end of The Village Parking Structure near Total Wine and More & Cava Mezze Grill, the Bike Lockers are adjacent to the garage stairs. Bike Lockers are free to use and you must provide your own lock. Locks left on for more than 48 hours will be cut and contents will be removed and donated to charity.
  • Bike Repair Station: Located at the Bike Lockers, the bike repair station incudes a pump, phillips and standard screw drivers, a tire lever and a cone wrench.
  • Bike Racks: Bike racks can be found in several locations at The Village including outside of Costco and along the walkway near the retailers facing Topanga Canyon Boulevard. Bikes must be locked with a proper bike lock, and locks will be cut and bikes donated to charity if bikes are left locked up more than 48 hours.

 For further information please text Guest Services at The Village at 818.306.5956.

Who’s hiring? Check out job postings for Westfield Topanga/The Village or one of our retail stores, restaurants or specialty shops.

 For current retailer employment opportunities, click here.

 For current Westfield Employment opportunities, click here.

In partnership with Happy Returns, Westfield Topanga Guest Services makes it easy to return online purchases while visiting the Center! 

Simply bring qualifying online purchases from Happy Returns' participating retailers to the Guest Service desk, and the Guest Service Ambassador will process the return for you and initiate your refund immediately—with no packing or shipping required—all at no cost to you!

Head to Westfield PlaySpace and let your little ones have fun while you keep a close eye on the action. Kids can climb and explore the bright, colorful play area filled with animal characters, large puzzles, and plenty of space to stretch those active little legs.

Children in Westfield PlaySpace must to be supervised by an adult at all times.

PlaySpace is located on the Second Level between Macy's and the Food Court.

Complimentary wheelchairs are available at Westfield Security for our visitors with limited mobility. Please contact Westfield Security Office, present a photo ID, and we’ll be happy to help. For more information, please call.
Misplaced an item during your visit? Please contact Westfield Security Team for immediate assistance.

Get your car washed while shopping!

Drop off your car near Valet (between Lazy Dog & Wokano).

The car wash is open daily from 10:00 am - 6:00 pm.
We can’t guarantee they’ll eat their vegetables, but kids will love the colorful tables and chairs that are the perfect size for smaller arms and legs.

valleyfair.description:
Not sure where a store is located? Want to know the price of an item? Need assistance with a wheelchair? Introducing Answers on the Spot, a new service provided by Westfield Valley Fair.

Text with your center questions, and get an instant response from Westfield Valley Fair.

If you’re short on shopping cash or need to check your account balance, stop at one of our safe, convenient ATMs at the following locations:

  • Lower Level near Macy's Women's, next to the escalator
  • Lower Level near Sephora, next to the elevator
  • Dining Terrace, in front of Loving Hut
  • Lower Level in Nordstrom Court, Behind the Guest Services desk

The Bitcoin machine is located on Level 2 between Pandora and Pottery Barn. Customers receive 3% back when shopping with Bitcoin. What Is Bitcoin: Bitcoin is an online payment system invented by Satoshi Nakamoto, where users can transact directly without needing an intermediary. Bitcoin is often called the first cryptocurrency, although prior proposals existed. Bitcoin is more correctly described as the first decentralized digital currency. It is the largest of its kind in terms of total market value.

21 VALLEY FAIR MERCHANTS CURRENTLY ACCEPT BITCOIN: American Eagle, Athleta, Banana Republic, Bath & Body Works, Best Buy Mobile, Brookstone, Build-a-Bear, Champs, The Cheesecake Factory, Foot Locker, Gap, Gap Kids, Gap Baby, Hot Topic, Old Navy, Sephora, Starbucks, Victoria's Secret, Pink, and Zales.

BrightBox Charging Stations are free phone charging stations placed at two central locations in Westfield Valley Fair- Level 2 in the Dining Terrace and Level 1 near the Play Space across Mealtop. Stations feature a, four-step process on touch screens, charge 95% of all phones including iPhone, Android, Blackberry and Windows and have a secure chamber door for your phone’s security.

Guest Services now accepts the China Union Pay Credit Card and China Union Pay Debit Card as a form of payment for Westfield Gift Cards.

If you would like to make a purchase at a retailer that does not accept China Union Pay Cards, please stop by Guest Services for assistance. Guests can now purchase a Westfield Gift Card ($3 fee additional activation fee, on top of gift card value), and then use the gift card to purchase items at that retail location. Please note: retailer must accept American Express gift cards.

For more information please contact Westfield Guest Services, option 6.

Make your Shopping a breeze with Free curbside pickup at Westfield Valley Fair! Shop at your favorite stores through Curbside and pick up your order outside. Curbside is located off of Forest Ave. adjacent to Luxury Valet.
Take advantage of our best exchange rates while you choose from over 75 currencies, available now for your next trip. Kiosk is located on Level 2 in front of Victoria's Secret.

Gifts can be beautifully wrapped at the following locations (fees may apply):

PAPYRUS Located near the Dining Terrace on Level 2
For a special evening out or last-minute reservation let Westfield Guest Services take care of the details.
Pets are not allowed at Westfield Valley Fair, with the exception of leashed service animals when accompanying a person with a disability for whom the animal is performing work or tasks.

Recycling your old phones, MP3 players and tablets doesn’t have to be a hassle. We want to make EcoATM the most convenient way for you to recycle, and not only that – we want to pay you for stopping by. In only three steps, you can leave a positive impact on the planet while also putting a little cash in your pocket.

The EcoATM is located on Level 2 by Pizza My Heart and the Nordstrom Parking Structure mall entrance.

Who’s hiring? Check out job postings for one of our retail stores, restaurants, or specialty shops.

Current employment opportunities»

For current Westfield job openings, please click here.

If you are a Westfield Valley Fair retailer and would like to hire for your store, please click here.
With knowledge of over 200 stores and hundreds of brands, Westfield Guest Services are the ultimate resource to help find the unique gifts people love. Simply call.

Please find the Holiday Gift Wrapping Kiosk located on the 2nd floor near Williams-Sonoma starting on Black Friday, November 27 from 10am to 6pm and then beginning again on Saturday, December 12 going through to Thursday, December 24 open during all our Holiday business hours.

Please call Guest Services, Option 6. We will connect you with a person who speaks your preferred language.

Whether you are visiting by car, train, bus or taxi, Westfield Guest Services are available to assist you with transportation needs. Facilitation of car or limo service from your hotel, home or office is also available. Please call.
Misplaced an item during your visit? Please contact the Westfield Security Team for immediate assistance.

Please direct all media inquiries to our Public Relations team at Edelman:

VINEETHA PATHROSE


415-486-3258 or

YOU LIKE TO LOOK GOOD STYLEKOUNCIL SHOPPING PACKAGES

VIP STYLE SELECT

Shop for high style with priceless advice. Minimum 3 hours/$160 per hour.

RED CARPET CHIC

FIX UP, LOOK SHARP


Upgrade your everyday style.

Minimum 2 hours/$130 per hour.

THE GRAND TOUR


Share your session with friends. Minimum 3 hours. Price depends on the size of group.

Self-serve Smarte Carte strollers are available at the following locations:

  • Level 2 by Pizza My Heart (singles) $6
  • Level 2 by Bose (singles) $6
  • Level 2 by Macy's Women's Entrance, Amiri Salon and Mainland Skate (doubles) $8

Visa, Master Card, American Express and Discover Cards are accepted at all locations.

Please contact Westfield Guest Services, option 6 for assistance.

Whether you are visiting by car, train, bus or taxi, Westfield Guest Services are available to assist you with transportation needs. Facilitation of taxi from your hotel, home or office is also available. For more information please contact Westfield Guest Services, option 6.

At Westfield Valley Fair, enjoy the ease and convenience of two professional valet services, including The Cheesecake Factory Valet and Luxury Collection Valet.

VALET RATES

$8 per car, payable by cash or credit card.

CHEESECAKE FACTORY VALIDATION

The Cheesecake Factory offers $1 off valet parking with validation

VALET HOURS OF OPERATION

 THE CHEESECAKE FACTORY VALET

  • Saturday: 10:00 am - 9:00 pm

Please do not leave vehicle unattended. Driver must leave keys with attendant.

Need to relax, recharge, or just catch your breath? The Family Lounge is a comfortable area where you and your little ones can take a break from shopping. This special spot for families features kid-friendly TV programs, nursing areas, and baby changing stations.

Located on Level 1 near Stride Rite and the Playspace.

Have to get a gift, but don't know their size or favorite color? Need to pick up a present, but don't have time to shop? Westfield Gift Cards by American Express are the perfect solution. The card may be used virtually anywhere in the U.S. where American Express is accepted, and they're easily purchased at the Westfield Guest Services booth located on Level 1 near Nordstrom.

Buy Online Now.

Check gift card balance or transaction history at American Express.

Large Gift Card Orders

Purchases of more than 10 gift cards, or an order that totals over $1,000, are considered a bulk gift card order. We require at least an hour to process the gift card order. If possible, please call ahead of time.

valleyfair.description:
Westfield Guest Service Ambassadors give a new distinction to service, with warm, knowledgeable assistance to assure an effortless and enjoyable experience during your visit.

From dinner reservations to transportation assistance, gift suggestions to itinerary planning, our highly-trained Guest Service Ambassadors are committed to perfecting your experience. Offering the latest information on nearby attractions, events, and activities, staff can assist with any personal services you might require while traveling - from coordinating spa appointments to personal shopping assistance to Westfield Gift Cards.

Westfield Guest Service Ambassadors are located on Level 1 near Nordstrom. For more information please contact Westfield Guest Services, option 6

SPEAK UP!

How was your visit to our center? We’d love to hear from you. Share your Westfield experience.

Head to Westfield PlaySpace and let your little ones have fun while you keep a close eye on the action. Kids can climb and explore the bright, colorful play area filled with animal characters, large puzzles, and plenty of space to stretch those active little legs.

Children in the PlaySpace must to be supervised by an adult at all times.

Located on Level 1 near Macy’s Women’s.

Complimentary wheelchairs  are available for our visitors with limited mobility. Please contact the Guest Services or the Westfield Security Office, present a photo ID, and we’ll be happy to help.

The wheelchairs  are subject to availability.

For your convenience, you will also find handicap accessible parking near the main entrances. For more information, please contact Westfield Guest Services, option 6.

wheaton.description:
Head to Westfield PlaySpace and let your little ones have fun while you keep a close eye on the action. Kids can climb and explore the bright, colorful play area filled with animal characters, large puzzles, and plenty of space to stretch those active little legs.

The PlaySpace is located on the 1st Level near DSW Shoes. Children are required to be supervised by an adult at all times.

Complimentary wheelchairs and scooters are available for our visitors with limited mobility. Just present a photo ID and we’ll be happy to help.

You'll find them at our Security and Public Safety Office located on the 2nd Level near Entrance 6 and Forever 21.

The wheelchairs and scooters are subject to availability.

Visiting us with kids in tow? Try a Smarte Carte stroller! Little ones will love riding in these colorful vehicles, and you’ll love keeping them close while you shop.

Smarte Carte strollers feature:

  • Plenty of space for personal items and purchases
  • Two convenient cup holders and a snack tray
