To take advantage of our super-fast service, simply access the internet from your laptop or phone as normal and follow the on-screen prompts.

All services subject to availability. Terms and conditions appl

Need to relax, recharge, or just catch your breath? The Family Lounge is a comfortable area where you and your little ones can take a break from shopping. This special spot for families features toys, kid-friendly TV programs, private nursing areas, and baby changing stations.

The Family Lounge is located on the 2nd Level in the Food Court.

Loading kids and packages can be challenging, so take advantage of our preferred up-front parking spots. They’re close to entrances and make it easier for expectant mothers and families with small children to visit our Center.

Westfield Wheaton Family Parking is located in the JCPenney parking lot, the Costco/Target parking lot, the Macy's parking deck, and the South parking deck near DSW Shoes.

Play, shop, eat -- find fun events, ideas, and offers for the whole family!

westfieldworldtradecenter.description: Not sure where a store is located? Need a restaurant suggestion? Introducing Answers on the Spot, a service provided by Westfield World Trade Center. Text us with your center question and get an instant response from the Westfield World Trade Center Concierge.

If you’re short on shopping cash, or need to check your account balance, stop at one of our convenient Chase ATMs at the following locations:

  • Main Level C2 south entrance by Aesop
  • Main Level C2 north entrance near John Varvatos
  • Main Level C2 east just down the steps near the future E train entrance
  • Main Level C2 south entrance across from Forever 21
  • Mezzanine C1M near Pure Liquid Wine & Spirits

In addition, there is a full service Chase Bank located on Main Level C2 near the west entrance.

Whether you dash in for a quick stop, or stay for an entire day of shopping, all our guests are important to us. Westfield Concierge want you to have the best experience possible, so we’re here to help. We can direct you to a specific store, make dinner reservations, find local services, and much more. Please stop by and say "hello," and let us know if there’s anything we can do for you.

At Westfield World Trade Center, Concierge are located on C2, Main Level of the Oculus.

Concierge hours at Westfield World Trade Center are Monday - Friday 7:00am to 9:00pm, and Saturday Sunday from 9:00am-9:00pm.

At Westfield World Trade Center, please visit our Concierge Desk, located on C2, the main level of the Oculus to inquire about a wheelchair.  We politely ask our guests to provide a Photo ID and valid cell phone number at time of pick up.
We invite you to purchase a Westfield Gift Card seven days a week at our Concierge Desk, located on C2, the main level of the Oculus.

Our Westfield World Trade Center Concierge Team is available to assist with your dinner reservations including Eataly in Tower 4 and throughout Manhattan.  Tell us your culinary desires, and we’ll handle the rest.

Telephone: 212.284.9982

Text: 646.480.7003

Email: wwtcconcierge@westfield.com

Interested in working at Westfield World Trade Center?  Our Concierge team maintains a full list of employment opportunities with our retail partners or you may search online:

COMING SOON:  Retail and Restaurant Opportunities

Westfield Employment Opportunities

Our multi-lingual Concierge Team is ready to assist and communicate in numerous languages including Arabic, French, German, Mandarin, and Spanish. In addition, we offer “Language Line,” an interpreting service with up to 200 languages available.

Please stop by our Concierge Desk for assistance.
The Westfield Concierge Desk can help you reserve tickets to local attractions & shows.  Please contact the Concierge Desk for assistance.
For the safety and comfort of all our guests, we invite properly certified and identified service animals in the course of performing service only.

There are many different transportation options in the area surrounding Westfield World Trade Center.

 

Subways

From the east side of the Oculus, go up the stairs to access to Fulton Center which provides the service of eight different trains:

                -A/C  (Blue Line)

                -J/Z  (Brown Line)

                -2/3  (Red Line)

                -4/5   (Green Line)

 

PATH

The New Jersey PATH station is located at the bottom of the stairs on the west side of the Oculus.  The PATH services major cities in New Jersey including Hoboken, Jersey City and Newark.

 

New York Waterway Ferry

From the west side of the Oculus, continue through the West Concourse where the Ferry departs from Vesey Street.

 

Taxi and Car Service

Taxi and Car Service are both available from the street level.

With over 100 brands available, our Concierge Team is very knowledgeable and ready to assist with all your gifting needs.  Need the latest “hot” gift for a friend, family member or co-worker?  Allow our Concierge Team to get creative for you!

Telephone: 212.284.9982

Text: 646.480.7003

Email: wwtcconcierge@westfield.com

Have you misplaced an item during your visit? Please reach out to our Concierge Team for assistance. We’ll work closely with our entire staff to locate your item.

Telephone: 212.284.9982

Text: 646.480.7003

Email: wwtcconcierge@westfield.com

Postal Services

The main post office is located directly across the street from Westfield World Trade Center. 

 

COMING SOON:  Westfield postage stamps will be available at the Concierge Desk.

london.description:
With easy access from the West Cross route and 4,500 parking spaces located right underneath the shops, travelling to Westfield by car couldn't be easier.

See our Getting Here Section for more details and pricing.

As Westfield London embarks on upgrades to the centre, which will bring an expanded retail offer alongside a range of other enhancements, works are currently in place on Ariel Way and around the entrance to the car park. To ensure a smooth journey to and from the centre, please note the temporary changes to Car Park access.

Until late 2016, for cars visiting Westfield London, access to the centre car park is now via the A3220 West Cross Route only. There is currently no access to the car park via Wood Lane and no through traffic route between Wood Lane/ Ariel Way and the A3220 West Cross Route.

Exiting the basement car park from Level -3 will be reduced from two lanes to one, which may cause minor delays for customers but we have taken measures to ensure that delays are as minimal as possible.

We are very excited to have started the journey to delivering a further enhanced Westfield London and we thank you for your patience while these works are carried out.

PARKING TARIFFS
0 - 1 Hours: £2.90
1 - 2 Hours: £5.80
2 - 24 Hours: £8.00

SMART PARKING

Smart Parking is coming soon to Westfield London. The new service, which will replace Express Parking, will allow members to save up to 25% on standard charges and enjoy the convenience of ticketless parking.

Sign up here to be the first to know when Smart Parking launches.

Sign up>

VALET PARKING

If you're short of time, why not use our Valet Parking service? Simply enter the car park and follow the red signs to Valet Parking.

Let our expert teams take away the strain of parking. Hand over your keys and relax in the luxury private lounge while enjoying complimentary beverages or head straight to the shops! Ten minutes before you're ready to leave, simply buzz your hand-held device and your car will be waiting for you when you return.

What could be more simple?

Simply enter the car park and follow the red signs to Valet Parking to find the forecourt and our team of Valet Associates ready and waiting to assist. Valet Parking costs £15.* Please call 020 3371 2388 for more information.

Prices:
Monday - Friday - £15
Saturday - Sunday - £18

***If you are a registered Express parking user, valet parking remains at £10* £10 is on top of your standard parking charge.

Premium Package Valet (Parking, valet parking & handsfree)
Monday - Friday £25
Saturday - Sunday £28

Premium Package (Valet parking & handsfree)
Monday - Sunday £20

Opening times:
Monday to Saturday 10am - 9pm
Sunday 11am - 6pm

Opening times may vary around bank holidays and holiday periods.

Please check in advance by calling 020 3371 2300.

Car Park Space Indicator

Once you reach the car park, our vehicle management system indicates to you whether a space is vacant (green light), occupied (red light), exclusively for blue badge holders (blue light) or parents with prams (orange light).

Motorcycle and scooter parking is FREE!

Simply take a ticket at the barrier and enter the car park. While you're free to park anywhere, we ask that you try not to park in the designated bays and find a place outside the standard car spaces. When you're ready to leave, just buzz the assistance button next to the barrier and our car park staff will let you out.

Electric car charger

Charge your electric car for free at Westfield London at our car park charging points located on the Upper and Middle car park.
Discover new looks you'll love and wardrobe solutions you need with a Personal Styling Session at Westfield London W12. Click here to find out more about Personal Styling here at Westfield London.

Whether you want to update your social media channels while you're out shopping or Skype your friends to get their opinion on some clothes you're trying on, you can surf the net for free wherever you are at Westfield London. All you need to do is log on to our Wi-Fi service from your laptop, tablet or phone and follow the on-screen instructions.

Need a hand logging on? Just visit any one of our Concierge desks and the staff there will be happy to help.

All services are subject to availability.

Terms and conditions apply.

If you wish to arrive or depart from the Centre via taxi or private hire vehicle, you don't have to brave the elements outside.

Simply come to our warm, dry Taxi Lounge and we will call one for you or, if available, you can simply take a black taxi from the taxi queue. The Taxi Lounge is located in Lift Lobby 2 on the Middle Car Park (Level -2).

If you wish to depart from Westfield London today using a taxi or private hire vehicle service we recommend you book in advance to avoid any delays to your journey; our Concierge team would be pleased to assist you.

This can be done at any time within our Centre opening hours by visiting our Taxi Lounge and Shopmobilty desk or by using the contact details below. Further information on London taxi services and providers can be found at http://www.tfl.gov.uk

Have your shopping delivered to your home or hotel at the hour of your choosing with our new and incredibly convenient delivery service.

If your delivery location is within 10 miles of our Centre, simply bring your items to our Handsfree Shopping Desk and we will present you with the list of available hours for same-day or next-day delivery.

The service costs £15, and this includes as much as you can fit into a box sized 1.2m x 1.0m x 1.0m.

If your delivery destination is further than 10 miles from Westfield London, we will still arrange your delivery, however you won't be able to select the hour of its arrival. We can arrange for delivery to addresses all around the UK and to International destinations too. Delivery times and cost will vary depending on your location – the Concierge team will be able to supply you with a quote upon request.

Please see Concierge for terms and conditions.

Our premium services packages, available to purchase now from Concierge, are stylishly presented and deliver a unique shopping experience at Westfield London the perfect gift idea, or a relaxing treat for yourself.

Our Packages consist of your choice of vouchers that can be redeemed for a selection of our luxurious services, including Personal Stylist, Handsfree Shopping and Valet Parking. Vouchers can all be redeemed on one date, or separately if you prefer, and are valid for six months from the date of purchase.

Premium Services Packages available to purchase from Concierge:
£200 - Personal Stylist, Valet Parking and Handsfree Shopping
£195 - Personal Stylist and Handsfree Shopping
£25 - (Mon - Fri) Valet Parking and Handsfree Shopping*
£28 - (Sat - Sun) Valet Parking and Handsfree Shopping*

*Please note: a £10 supplement cost will apply after every 10 additional bags.

Valet Parking
Park in style- hand over your keys, freshen up in our Valet Parking Lounge and then go shopping. When you're ready to go, your car will be waiting for you. For more information click here.

Handsfree Shopping
You don't even have to carry your own shopping at Westfield London. Our Handsfree Shopping service takes the strain while you continue shopping, eating or catching up with friends. For more information click here.

Personal Stylist
Be captivated by the experience and personal service of our expert stylists at Westfield London provided by The Style Doctors. For more information click here.

Don't let limited mobility stop you or a friend from enjoying Westfield London. Book a free wheelchair or motorised scooter to make the most of our wheelchair-friendly malls and restaurants.

Driving to Westfield London

If you're planning on driving to Westfield London, Shopmobility couldn't be easier to find. Simply follow the signs for Shopmobility and Middle Car Park from the Car Park entrance adjacent to the Ariel Way roundabout they'll lead you directly to the Shopmobility desk in Lift Lobby 2 where one of our trained Concierge staff will assist you.

Blue Badge

Any guest who is a Blue Badge holder will be permitted four hours' free parking Monday to Friday inclusive.

To qualify for this promotional offer, simply present your Blue Badge and parking ticket to our staff at the Shopmobility desk located within Lift Lobby 2 (Middle Car Park). The parking ticket will then be validated, and any additional parking charges must be made at the nearest parking payment machine. Staff are not permitted or able to accept any payment.

Blue Badge holders must be present so that staff working in Shopmobility can verify the ownership of the card.

Note: parking tickets can only be validated at our Shopmobility desk and during normal opening hours. Parking charges outside of these hours will incur the normal parking charge.

Parking Bays

Over 5 percent of parking bays at Westfield London are dedicated to disabled parking.

Manual wheelchairs and motorised scooter hire

Manual wheelchairs and motorised scooters are available on the day to hire. To rent a mobility vehicle, you will need proof of identification, which should be either a valid passport or two of the following: valid driver's licence, valid ID card, credit card, pension card or health care card.

On presentation of these, you'll be asked to fill out a hire agreement form and leave a £10 deposit. Once that's done, you're ready to go. The whole process takes less than 15 minutes (including training on how to use the vehicle if it's your first time).

________________________________________

*Parking tickets can only be validated at our Shopmobility desk and during their normal opening hours. Parking charges outside of these hours will incur the normal parking charge.

**There is vehicle height restriction of 2150mm in the Shopmobility Car Park area. If your vehicle is over this height, please call and one of our trained staff will advise you on alternative parking.

Tax-free shopping is available at both Westfield shopping centres. Staff at the Travelex desks in each centre will help you fill out all of your tax forms in advance of getting to the airport. At Westfield London, the Ice Bureau will give you an immediate tax refund (conditions apply).

Step 1: When making a purchase in a participating store, ask the sales assistant for a tax refund voucher/receipt and complete the form in-store. You may then be able to claim a cash tax refund immediately at ICE Currency Exchange at Westfield London if your receipt has the Global Blue, Premier Tax Free or Tax Free Worldwide logo (although a small charge may be applied for this service). You must remember to keep your receipts as you will need to present the goods, receipts and completed documentation to border officials upon leaving the EU. Customers should note that there are alternatives to ICE International Currency Exchange.

Step 2: If you cannot make a claim immediately, then you should present the goods, your passport, shop receipt and tax free form to Customs upon exiting the EU and have the refund form stamped.

Step 3: Stamped forms may be mailed to the tax refund services provider in an envelope for a refund direct to credit cards or a bank account. Stamped forms may also be presented at participating currency exchange locations e.g. Travelex.

Our dedicated Concierge team have multilingual copies of guidance produced by the tax refund service provider, which are available for you to take away. Copies of HM Revenue & Customs notice 704/1, which contains detailed guidance on the refund process, can be downloaded as PDF documents as well as obtained from the Concierge team.

The Concierge team can also advise you on which retailers partner with which tax refund service provider, and tell you the nearest location to obtain a cash refund. If you have any questions in advance, please contact us.

Important notes:

You must live outside of the EU to be entitled to a VAT refund and leave the EU by the third month following the month of purchase e.g. items purchased in January must be exported by 30th April that year. In order to be eligible for a VAT refund in Europe, you must reside outside the European Union. The following countries are members of the EU: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden and the United Kingdom. Terms and conditions may vary between retailers and tax refund service providers and some retailers may set their own conditions - for example, that you spend a minimum amount in one store on the same day. Please check individual retailers in advance.

Refunds are subject to status and cash refund as well as tax refund provider terms and conditions. Other refund methods and locations are available outside Westfield London. The information contained in these web pages is, to the best of our knowledge, true and accurate at the time of publication, and is solely for informational purposes. Westfield accepts no liability for any loss or damage that arises as a result of use of or reliance on this information, whether authorised or not.

Westfield London is a child safe shopping centre and as part of our family facilities, we offer a hotline number to assist parents and guardians in finding children who have been separated from them whilst out shopping.

Pick up you free wristbands in centre!
When you visit Westfield London, you will be able to obtain free wristbands for your children from the Concierge desks located in The Atrium, near Marks & Spencer and at the Shopmobility Desk on Level -2.

A contact telephone number should be written on the wristband and in the event of your child being lost, you will be contacted quickly and reunited.

If you lose a child whilst shopping:
Stay close to where you last saw the
Look for the Child Safe Zone stickers displayed on shop doors and windows
Ring the number displayed on the sticker
Speak directly to our Security team who will help you

Teach your child to do the following, if they get lost:
Stop, stand still and look, don't run about
If they see the person they were with, go to them and hold their hand#
If lost in a shop, go to the nearest till point and talk to the shop staff (Most shop assistants will wear uniforms or name badges)
If in the shopping centre, tell them to look for the smiley orange balloon window sticker, then look for a parent with children and ask them to ring the number
Do not go up to anyone else and do not leave the shopping centre with a stranger!

The best way to help a lost child:

Encourage children to stay close to you
Use reins or wrist links
Don't leave them in an unsupervised play area
Write your contact number on a child safe wristband
Carry an up to date photograph of your child
Take note of what your child is wearing

For more information regarding Child Safe shopping at Westfield London, please pop along to the Concierge desk.

As we're now a CollectPlus location, you can pick up your online purchases straight from our dedicated lounge at Westfield London. What's more, you can enjoy one hour of free parking* and complimentary refreshments. And if you're not happy with your purchase, you can return it directly from the CollectPlus lounge!

How it works:

After you've placed your online order, simply do the following:

1. For your delivery location, select CollectPlus and search for W12 7SL, then choose 'Westfield London'.
2. CollectPlus will then text or email you to confirm that your delivery is ready to pick up.
3. Pick up and try on your items in our dedicated lounge and changing rooms.
4. Return unwanted items right from the lounge if necessary.

What the bloggers said about CollectPlus:

"Westfield London kindly invited myself and some other mega babe bloggers to test the waters on their CollectPlus service lounge. Linked with a bunch of online clothing shops such as ASOS, Very and Office (to name a few), you are able to order your delivery directly to the Westfield Collect Lounge where you can collect your items and try them on in a very snazzy private changing room. Even better, if it doesn't fit or you don't like it, you can return it on the spot. For you drivers out there, if using this service you are able to have one hour free parking too. Not too shabby, aye? I have to say I was impressed massively with the service and ease _ I was genuinely pleased with how easy it was."

- Callie, from TheCornersOfTheCurve.com

Lost property is a free service where all lost items within the centre are securely logged and kept for 28 days.

If lost property is not collected after a month, the items are donated to Westfield's Chosen Charity. Should you lose any items whilst visiting Westfield please contact the lost property number - please note that this applies to items that are lost within the Mall and not specific retailers as most retailers keep their own goods and have their own procedure.

How long can Concierge store the Lost Property for?

• Concierge will only store lost property for up to three months

• Completed Lost Property log books are stored at Concierge desks

How can I contact Westfield about my lost property?

• Please contact the Westfield Concierge team who will be able to assist further

What happens if the guest doesn't collect the items within that time frame of three months?

• All the uncollected items will be donated to charity

Printing is available from a stand-alone secure PC within the centre from our Concierge Desk.

Choose to print from email and USB sticks with a cost of £1 per page.

If you require a large amount of printing, a bulk printing price is negotiable on the day.

Leave your items with us and enjoy a hassle-free trip to Westfield Stratford City.

Our Cloakroom can be found at our Concierge Services Desk on the Lower Ground Floor next to Carephone Warehouse.

You also have the option to have your items delivered to any London postcode through our same day Home Delivery service.

Kiddy Cars can be hired from one of our concierge desks on either the Lower Ground Floor (next to Starbucks), First Floor concierge desk (next to Costa Coffee) and also in shop mobility on the Lower Ground Floor in car park A.

From the 1st September 2014, hire of a double kiddy car will increase to £10, of which £2 is a refundable deposit.

The service is offered on a first-come, first-served basis and Kiddy Car drivers must be over 12 months old and no taller than 104 cm. For safety reasons, an adult must accompany the child at all times.

InSpiration

InSpiration is a multi-faith worship and prayer area for the shoppers of Westfield Stratford City, open to people of all faiths and none.

It is a private space in the bustling centre where you can drop in for some quiet time or speak to one of the volunteer chaplains managing the space. It is a large room on the Third Floor near the Cafe Court, and has an open area which will be used for collective activities such as religious services and formal talks. In addition, there is a smaller lounge area with armchairs and tables for a quiet peaceful experience.

InSpiration is staffed from 11:00am daily by a team of volunteers. Shoppers are welcome from 11am until 7pm (5pm on Sundays). Outside of these hours, the space will not be available to customers.

Show your friends or family how much you care by giving them a gift with real appeal. Flexible, cost-effective and offering a world of choice, Westfield Gift Cards are accepted at a wide selection of Westfield Stratford City stores, so your loved ones are sure to find something they really want.

Gift Cards are available from £5 to £1000 in a range of designs, and are redeemable against most purchases - including sale goods - at most stores within Westfield Stratford City and Westfield London.

You can choose to upgrade this service to home delivery when you are finished your journey.

Price is £10 (flat rate) for 10 bags.

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

We aim to collect your shopping and have your shopping ready for collection within 15-20 minutes of the Hands free Shopping desk receiving a call from the retailer notifying us that your shopping is ready for collection from their premises. However, we cannot guarantee this time period and do not accept liability if despite our efforts the service suffers any delays. We reserve the right not to accept any item of shopping, including food, beverages, perishable items, flowers or delicate or breakable objects. Your shopping must be collected at the end of the day. A surcharge of £5.00 will be added for guests who exceed ten bags per day. Shopping not collected within 28 days will be disposed of. Because we do not know the value of your shopping, we limit our liability for loss or damage to your shopping to £500 per item and £5000 in total, and we are only responsible for loss or damage to your shopping which is our fault. Any loss or damage must be notified to us as soon as possible.

Wherever you are at Westfield Stratford City, you can surf the net for free. So if you want to Skype your friends to show them some new clothes you're trying on, or want to check in at our centre, you can do so without being charged!

All you need to do is log on to our Wi-Fi service from your laptop, tablet or phone and follow the on-screen instructions.

Need a hand logging on? Just visit any one of our Concierge desks and the staff there will be happy to help.

All services are subject to availability.

When a nappy needs changing, or a toddler needs taming, head to one of our three Parent Rooms where you'll find an oasis of peace and tranquillity.

As well as baby-changing facilities, you'll also find child-sized toilets and sinks, private areas for feeding, and microwaves. In addition, the rooms have a play area and television for older children.

You'll find Parent Rooms on the Lower Ground Floor, Ground and the First Floor.

Shopmobility scooters:

Manual wheelchairs and motorised scooters are available on the day to hire.

To hire a mobility vehicle, you will need proof of identification which should be either a valid passport, or two of the following: valid driver's license, valid ID card,, pension card or a health care card. On presentation of these, you'll be asked to fill out a hire agreement form and leave a £10 deposit.

Once that's done, you're ready to go. The whole process takes less than 15 minutes (including training on how to use the vehicle if it's your first time).

Shopmobility is located on the Lower Ground Floor in the lift lobby near Carphone Warehouse. Car Park C , central lift lobby area, provides the nearest parking for Shopmobility users whose vehicle is below 2.2m high.

*This is an all day charge.

Blue Badge parking:

Westfield Stratford City has been designed with disabled access in mind. Designated parking bays for people with disabilities are available in each car park.  High-sided vehicles up to 2.4m for blue badge holders are catered for in Car Park A.  The Lower Ground Level (P1) has suitable parking for these vehicles and is also the location for our shopmobility facility which is beside Carphone Warehouse on the lower ground floor.

In order for our Concierge team to assist our visually impaired customers during their visit to Westfield Stratford City, we now have a booking system in place.

Requests can be emailed to wscconciergeservices@Westfield-UK.com - alternatively, you can telephone 02082217359 during centre opening hours or visit Concierge services next to Carphone Warehouse on the Lower Ground Floor.

We wish to offer this service so that our customers are not kept waiting during peak periods - while visually impaired customers will not be turned away at any time, they may encounter delays in receiving assistance.

The following periods of time are available for pre-booking:

Monday to Fridays 2.30pm - 4.30pm

Our Concierge staff will accompany you to your chosen destination within Westfield and leave you in the capable hands of a customer assistant at the store of your choice, before picking you up from this destination once you've finished shopping. However, we are not able to offer a full personal shopping services.

Find My Car

When it's time to head home, the last thing you want to do is search high and low for your car.

The 'Find My Car' service offers an easy way for you to locate your vehicle - just type in your registration number on the Westfield mobile app or on our touchscreen directories around the centre, and you'll see a photo of your car along with a map showing where it is. Easy to follow directions will take you right there.

Featuring webcams allowing clients to watch their car being valeted, an online booking facility, free newspapers and surprise gifts left in clients' cars, as well as complimentary bike hire in the summer months, H20 Car Valeting is not to be missed.

At Westfield Stratford City, you'll find a unique range of services to make sure family shopping is fun for everyone, from our spacious, pushchair-friendly malls to our many lifts.

Kiddy Cars

Kiddy Cars can be hired from either one of our Concierge desks on the Lower Ground Floor (next to Starbucks) and (next to Costa Coffee).

Hiring a normal kiddy car costs £8, while hiring a double kiddy car costs £10, with both prices inclusive of a £2 refundable deposit. The service is offered on a first-come, first-served basis and Kiddy Car drivers must be over 12 months old and height restrictions apply: (i) for small single seater Kiddy cars children must be under 90cm; (ii) for large single seater Kiddy cars children must be over 90cm and under 99cm; (iii) the same height restrictions apply to the double- seater Kiddy car of 90cm. For safety reasons, an adult must accompany the child at all times.

Parent Rooms

When a nappy needs changing or a toddler needs taming, head to one of our three Parent Rooms where you'll find an oasis of peace and tranquillity.

As well as baby-changing tables, you'll find child-sized toilets and sinks, private areas for feeding, and microwaves. In addition, the rooms have a play area and television for older children.

You'll find our Parent Rooms on the Lower Ground Floor, Ground and First Floor.

Playworld

Let your little ones blow off some steam in a specially-designed play area for children aged five years and under.

Find our three Playworld locations on the Lower Ground Floor adjacent to Waitrose, in the World Food Court on the First Floor, and outside on The Street.

Child safe shopping

Westfield Stratford City is a child safe shopping centre and, as part of our family facilities, we offer a hotline number helping parents and guardians to find children who have been separated from them.

Pick up your free wristbands in centre.

When you visit Westfield Stratford City, you'll be able to obtain free wristbands for your children from all Concierge desks.

A contact telephone number should be written on the wristband and, in the event of your child being lost, you'll be contacted quickly and reunited.

If you lose a child while shopping:

- Stay close to where you last saw them

- Look for the Child Safe Zone stickers displayed on shop doors and windows

- Ring the number displayed on the sticker

- Speak directly to our Security team Teach your child to do the following if they get lost

- Stop, stand still and look - don't run about

- If they see the person they were with, go to them and hold their hand

- If lost in a shop, go to the nearest till point and talk to the shop staff (most shop assistants will wear uniforms or name badges).
